programme.title: 21 Jump Street

programme.title: 21 Jump Street

programme.title: Wildlife Diaries Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Of Flying Foxes and Heat Waves
programme.desc: While the Tolga Bat Hospital is looking after endangered flying foxes, researchers are using thermographic cameras to search for flying foxes and koalas. But they can also detect bush and wildfire more quickly.

programme.title: Italy My Love
programme.desc: In ten coastal areas of Italy, we encounter people that have a very special relationship with their region. All of them love their country, their traditions and their work. We met with enthusiasts and hedonists that permitted us to take a glimpse into their everyday lives. Young Italians, who have rediscovered nature and its treasures. Others, that preserve the beauty, archaeologists that apply whole new methods, farmers that only cultivate that which the soil needs. Fishermen, who fish in the same way as it was done a century ago and tough, young men who play and dance the Tarantella. Dolphins, giant sea turtles and pink flamingos, which are researched, nursed back to health or simply...

programme.title: Wild Sardinia
programme.desc: Sardinia has always been the epitome of pure wilderness, an emerald of volcanic origin in the Mediterranean. 1900 metres of coastline and an infinite maze of offshore islands. But Sardinia also has other facets: green valleys, rugged mountains, murmuring brooks, mysterious ruins and a unique fauna. Just off of Sardinias coast is an untouched underwater paradise - uniquely beautiful, but also dangerous. Pilot whales, dolphins and mobula rays populate the waters at Capo Testa in the north of the island. In the west, the lagoons of Cabras represent a wild landscape of lakes in which thousands of flamingos live and hunt the red brine shrimps. In addition to the flamingos, grey and purple...

programme.title: Wild Switzerland
programme.desc: Gentle, green meadows, rugged rock faces, mysterious lakes, dense forests, tall mountains, low-lying river deltas, quietly meandering mountain streams and smack dab in the middle, a unique fauna - THIS is Switzerland! We trace the elementary power of nature and present animals and plants in landscapes that have hardly ever been touched by mankind. Switzerland is an alpine country, but it is also Europes surge tank. Rivers such as the Rhine and the Rhone have their sources here. Glaciers, crevasses, icy cold caves and the underwater dome of the Verzasca are the unusual settings we chose for this film. We meet with rare, selected animal species and present their behavioural patterns, such...

programme.title: Wild Skagerrak
programme.desc: The strait that connects the North Sea with the Baltic, with depths of over 700 metres, is notorious for its dangerously strong currents. But currents also mean food and therefore nourishment for the large swarms of fish that inhabit the region. The sea grass meadows are comparable with those off the Californian coast. Harbour seals, grey seals and orcas hunt here, as do the rare black mouth cat shark and porpoises. Close by, catfish mate, which in itself is quite spectacular and never caught on film in this way before. Lions mane jellyfish with nettle threads of up to 30 metres in length make their way through the open sea. Skagerraks coastal regions are amongst the most beautiful and...

programme.title: Europes Wild River - The Elbe - 1.000 Miles of Wildlife and Nature
programme.desc: The river rises in the Czech Giant Mountains. Here it is called the Labe. After Děčín it flows into Germany and is called Elbe. There are various explanations for the origin of the river name "Elbe". One often mentioned is the Latin name of the river "albia", which means "bright water". This would also explain why the stream is referred to with the feminine article "the Elbe", since the Latin term "albia" is also feminine. Rather poetic than linguistically probable, however, is the explanation that elves (Middle High German: alb) scurrying around the pines in the white river mists could have helped the river to get its name. Geographically, the river can be divided into different...

programme.title: The Sudheide - Woods, meadows, open country
programme.desc: Forests and fields, moors and heathland, shepherds and sheep - these are the symbols of an ostensibly unspoilt landscape that has inspired poets and painters alike for centuries. The secret of the almost 500 km² nature reserve Naturpark Sudheide lies in its diversity: the origins of its soil, geology and topography can be traced back to the ice age. But the region between Hamburg and Hannover is anything but unspoilt. For centuries, it was synonymous with heathland farmers and formed as a North German cultivated landscape. This documentary tells of an almost unknown region, which has been strongly influenced by mankind for centuries, yet still remains diverse in its nature. Nature...

programme.title: Wild Alpine Rivers - Life in the Extreme
programme.desc: What would happen to the mountains without water? They would turn into deserts, devoid of life and vegetation. But there are very few mountains without water on our planet. They take care of this themselves, creating their life’s element and taking water directly from the sky by entrapping the clouds around them. This water then collects on the flanks of the mountains, where it turns from rivulets into rivers, that flow out into the oceans. Mountains and water are symbiotic, a cycle that keeps life on earth going. Mountain streams slowly move along meadows before, only moments later, turning into the spray of waterfalls or small mystic lakes. What kind of life can be found in and around...

programme.title: Chiemgau, A Changing Landscape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chiemgau, A Changing Landscape: Episode 1
programme.desc: A few thousand years ago, there were bare moraine ridges and barren meltwater valleys here. A landscape born in the last ice age, characterized by the edge of the Alps, gentle hills, moors, and lakes. And by cultural richness, not only on the islands in Lake Chiemsee, with their famous monasteries and castles. Long before King Ludwig II, the first people settled in the Chiemgau region. Finds of hunting weapons from the Neanderthal era prove that the land was inhabited even during the ice age, probably because there was plenty of game to hunt. During the Bronze Age, one of the most important trade routes from the mountains to the Alpine foothills passed through here. Then came the Celts...

programme.title: Chiemgau, A Changing Landscape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Chiemgau, A Changing Landscape: Episode 2
programme.desc: Three times in the past two decades, the Chiemsee area has experienced "once-in-a-century" floods. Climate, wildlife, and landscape have changed, and it seems this transformation is accelerating. Species living in the flood zones are developing sophisticated survival strategies. Knot ants, for instance, place their queen in the middle and form a raft with their bodies, even conquering new habitats. Flooding is less of a disaster for nature and impacts humans more significantly.

programme.title: North Macedonia: Between Traditional Dances and Mini Navy
programme.desc: Northern Macedonia emerged from being a once constituent republic of the former Yugoslavia. Anyone wishing to discover unknown worlds has every chance of finding them in this young Balkan country, full of imposing mountains, lakes of crystal-clear water, original villages and centuries-old customs. Nevertheless, Northern Macedonia, which borders Serbia in the north and Greece in the south, considered to be one of the poorest countries in Europe.

programme.title: mareTV: The Blue and White Island World of Greece: Mykonos, Naxos and Tinos
programme.desc: Around the once sacred Isle of Delos, some 200 islands, including 20 larger ones, are arranged almost in a circle. This is where the name of the Greek island paradise comes from: Cyclades, a derivation of the Greek word kýklos, circle. Each cyclade has a unique character. The pelican Petros, about 20 years old, is the mascot of Mykonos. He moves from taverna to taverna all day long, scrounging fish. This works out sometimes well and sometimes not so well. Petros does have a few human friends who regularly slip him something, but all too often visitors eager to take pictures block his path. Then he has to "wiggle" his way through the crowd. Jackie Onassis is said to have once brought...

programme.title: The Green Heart of Croatia - At the Banks of River Sava
programme.desc: Every year, in the middle of Croatia, its the same story: after the annual snowmelt, a huge flood wave spills out of the Alps toward Zagreb and Belgrade. This leads to an increase in the River Savas water levels of some ten metres. The contents of more than ten billion bathtubs floods an area the size of Lake Constance, often for months on end, yet still the Croatian and Serbian capital is spared a flood disaster. One of the reasons for this is the fact that the Sava is able to flow unhindered. The annual floods not only create a natural retention reservoir for flood control: alongside the Sava lies a natural paradise, unique in Central Europe. In the species-rich, alluvial flood...

programme.title: Fertile Floods - Croatias Wetlands
programme.desc: Every year, in the middle of Croatia, its the same story: after the annual snowmelt, a huge flood wave spills out of the Alps toward Zagreb and Belgrade. The annual floods not only create a natural retention reservoir for flood control: alongside the Sava lies a natural paradise, unique in Central Europe. In the species-rich, alluvial flood...

programme.title: Dream Islands Of Europe: Capri, Ischia and Procida
programme.desc: Capri and Ischia are world famous. From Naples, its just a short hop over to the two islands. Perfect destinations, then, for a weeks cruise along the Gulf of Naples and the adjoining Amalfi Coast to the south. There, Positano, Amalfi or Salerno as well as a handful of other mostly small harbor towns are extremely worthwhile destinations.

programme.title: mareTV: Venice - Lagoon and Legend
programme.desc: Venice has been attracting people as if by magic for centuries. The Italians call her La Serenissima, or the sublime. Perched on wooden posts, she braves the elements and the huge, annual surge of visitors. Vogalonga is the name of a Venetian sports competition for women, in which the participants row their boats standing. This is a tradition that Guilia and Elena also follow. They train hard, as the yearly regatta is soon to begin. Anyone caught driving their water vehicle with more than 7 km/h through the canals of Venice, risks getting a ticket from local policewoman Lorenza Mariutti. The reason: the resulting waves gnaw at the foundations of the grand palaces. Venetians are very...

programme.title: The Beavers are back
programme.desc: The return of the beavers is one of the greatest success stories of nature conservation in Germany. Hunted for a long time and almost exterminated, today more than 35.000 beavers live in Germany again – and the trend is rising. But how did this happen? One gets to see the mostly nocturnal animals only rarely. Klaus WeiSSmann has spent more than two years tracking down the shy beavers and documenting their spread in Germany. Which ways do they use? What dangers are they exposed to? Step by step, this film tells the exciting and sometimes odd success story of the likeable rodents.

programme.title: Rewilding: Back to Nature
programme.desc: Worldwide, there are various projects and approaches to give nature more space again. The aim is to create larger wilderness areas that develop with hardly any influence of humans - by reintroducing so-called key animal species and creating a network of wilderness corridors across entire continents. Rewilding promises to be a cost-effective form of conservation in which we can boost biodiversity and protect the climate.

programme.title: The Secret of Migrating Birds - Tryst at the Red Sea
programme.desc: Each year in spring, Israel witnesses a unique spectacle. Many millions of migrating birds cross the land bridge between Africa, Asia and Europe.Their first major roosting place after an exhausting nonstop flight over the African deserts is in southern Israel – a vital stopover. Here they replenish their energy reserves. The flocks of migrating birds are pursued by flocks of ornithologists. Hundreds of birders flood into the port city of Eilat on the Red Sea to take part in the Migration Festival. For a week, Israels southernmost coastal resort is home to international scientists and amateur birders.

programme.title: King of the Mountains - Golden Eagle
programme.desc: Aerial shots of mating Golden eagles, a clash between a Golden and a White-tailed eagle, and an intimate glimpse into their nesting grounds combine to create a spectacular film. Tracking these majestic birds reveals the wild nature of their hunting grounds, showcasing the diverse animal and plant life that share their habitat with the king of the skies. Viewers are brought up close as the eagle effortlessly glides over forests and canyons, abruptly diving in a breathtaking pursuit of prey. Witnessing these birds in their natural habitats is witnessing them at their finest. Embark on a magnificent journey through the skies and landscapes with us.

programme.title: King of the Seas - Sea Eagle
programme.desc: The times where eagles have been seen as varmints are over. They are now perceived as an integral part of the food cycle. Due to the fact that the habitats of the sea eagles in Germany are largely found in the north-eastern regions that are rich in water, the movie accompanies the eagles to an island, home to hundreds of sea ravens, where they rob the baby sea ravens of their food. They seem to always profit from the successes of the fellow creatures in their habitats. This film introduces you to the expert poachers of the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Cuckoo - The Enemy in My Nest
programme.desc: It’s no news that cuckoos are brood parasites: they lay their eggs into the nests of other bird species – a clever trick that spares the rearing of own offspring. Some even go as far as to kill the other chicks in the nest. But why do other parent birds let this happen? Are they too stupid? Too inept? Or simply clueless? Admittedly, cuckoo’s eggs do look deceptively genuine. But the cuckoo chick? Not even remotely! It quickly grows into a giant that looks nothing like its new family. So why don’t the adoptive parents notice the sham then? Until recently, the ornithologists’ theory was: the “victims” have yet to learn to counteract. Turns out: they may even profit from having strangers’...

programme.title: Snowy Owl: Queen of the North
programme.desc: No other owls are capable of surviving the extreme conditions, whereas the snowy owl is able to hunt through six months of bright sunshine and six months of twilight. This film follows a pair of snowy owls as they breed on the tundra of the High Arctic, 300 miles inside the Arctic Circle. Lemming numbers are low this year. Five owlets hatch and they face a struggle if any are going to survive.

programme.title: Hummingbirds: Jewelled Messengers
programme.desc: Hummingbirds live at the limits of what is possible. They have the highest metabolism with a heart rate of 1,200 beats per minute of any vertebrate. Their wings beat 50 times a second. They can hover on the spot, and even fly backwards. To our eyes, they are just a blur. But with the aid of high-speed cameras we can slow down their hyperactive lives and look into their secret world.

programme.title: Moksgmol - The Quest for the Spirit Bear
programme.desc: A forest that lives off fish, a white bear that is not a polar bear, and wolves that feed off the ocean… Canada’s Great Bear Rain Forest is a strange and pristine world, a land that time almost forgot. The awe-inspiring northern coastline of British Columbia with its great fjords that rival those in Norway, is the habitat of numerous species and the scene for the amazing co-existence of wolves, ravens, salmon, bears and a mystical rainforest, whose lives are intricately intertwined…

programme.title: Bear Essentials
programme.desc: We follow three young bears of different species – polar bears, brown bears and sloth bears (like Baloo, the Jungle Book Bear) – that inhabit dramatically varied landscapes as they find their way in the world. We look at how their mothers teach them the skills they need to survive and watch the many dangers they face. Their young lives are full of learning, moments of great tenderness and life-threatening drama. Over three years all of our bears, despite hardships and losses along the way, prove they have what it takes, they all have learned their bear essentials.

programme.title: Search for the Ghost Bears
programme.desc: Our film journey begins in Alaskas west. We are hoping to find glacier bears in the glacial regions of the Katmai National Park on the Douglas River. At the end of July, brown bears have now arrived to fish for salmon. In the surrounding forests, grizzlies look for berries and fresh, green twigs. The Katmai is Alaskas most volcanic area, and with 15 active volcanoes it is a veritable powder keg, surrounded by glaciers. In the Hook glacier region moose and lynx accompany us. Bald eagles have arrived at the glacial boundary and begin to tear apart their freshly caught prey. At last, we catch sight of a glacier bear. Hungry, he has left the ice region and has been forced down here in...

programme.title: Leap Of The Lynx
programme.desc: On the Iberian Peninsula, primeval landscapes are practically non-existent, so the Iberian lynx has lived on cultivated land for centuries – cattle, horse and pig pastures, cork oak forests, timberland, and even holy sites of pilgrimage. The diversity and beauty of these locations are truly stunning and their character and history as relevant to this story as that of the big cat itself. Until five years ago, both populations of Iberian lynx were quickly fading away. Their fragmented habitats were shrinking even further, they were starved by lack of prey and reduced by epidemics. But now, local authorities, scientists, landowners, and other groups have finally begun to act in unison.

programme.title: Secret Life Of Deer
programme.desc: 30 million white-tailed deer live in the United States. They have begun to adapt themselves to living in a world of traffic, pets and backyards. In Cayuga Heights, New York, the suburb’s residents are trying to get used to this exceptional living arrangement. The deer can be spotted daily from kitchen windows and porches. Life in the suburbs is deer heaven – large areas of grass, no predators and plenty of water means their population is on a steady rise. In this documentary, white-tailed deer are outfitted with special cameras to take the viewer into their world. Deercam allows us to see them in a new light – not frozen in the headlights of a car or as shy residents of the woods, but...

programme.title: The Moose Detective
programme.desc: Moose are an iconic species and of great importance to Sweden. That is why the country counts on a very special expert - the moose detective. Recently, a problem has developed on Öland regarding its moose. For a few years now on the island, the moose calves have been dying shortly after birth. Its a mystery. Every effort is made to save them. The island has called upon the moose detective to investigate. He follows several leads. Soon one of the suspects is identified - climate change. But it is not easy to convict the culprit. There are other suspects as well, the food shortage for example. Maybe they have joined hands as accomplices. In Sweden moose are very important. They are game...

programme.title: The Beavers are back
programme.desc: The return of the beavers is one of the greatest success stories of nature conservation in Germany. Hunted for a long time and almost exterminated, today more than 35.000 beavers live in Germany again – and the trend is rising. But how did this happen? One gets to see the mostly nocturnal animals only rarely. Klaus WeiSSmann has spent more than two years tracking down the shy beavers and documenting their spread in Germany. Which ways do they use? What dangers are they exposed to? Step by step, this film tells the exciting and sometimes odd success story of the likeable rodents.

programme.title: Rewilding: Back to Nature
programme.desc: Worldwide, there are various projects and approaches to give nature more space again. The aim is to create larger wilderness areas that develop with hardly any influence of humans - by reintroducing so-called key animal species and creating a network of wilderness corridors across entire continents. Rewilding promises to be a cost-effective form of conservation in which we can boost biodiversity and protect the climate.

Turns out: they may even profit from having strangers’...

programme.title: Bear Essentials

Over three years all of our bears, despite hardships and losses along the way, prove they have what it takes, they all have learned their bear essentials.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: The "Parque Natural da Ria Formosa" is one of the largest lagoon conservation areas in Europe. Bordered by five natural islands. A mosaic of sandbanks, brackish and freshwater lagoons and salt marshes. In 2010, the "Ria Formosa" was chosen as one of the seven natural wonders of Portugal. It is a unique ecosystem: in the winter months, more than 20,000 birds gather here. In addition, the nature park has one of the largest seahorse populations internationally. More than half of all fish species in the Atlantic are said to spawn in the lagoon.

programme.title: Wild Baltic
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Wild Baltic - Life on the Amber Coast
programme.desc: The first episode of this two-part nature documentary presents the natural beauty of the shifting sand dunes of the Curonian Spit, the romantic beaches of the Latvian Baltic Sea and the island worlds of Estonia. Time and again, this deserted and almost untouched nature fascinates. In the winter, ringed seals give birth to their young on the pack ice. In the spring, Konik wild horse stallions fight fierce battles amongst themselves, while colourful European rollers fly through the dune forests. Lynxes wander through the coastal forests and in the orchid meadows turncoats and hoopoes find more than enough food. On the islands around Saaremaa in Estonia, grey seals hunt for fish. They share...

programme.desc: A troubled teen is sent to live with his estranged father, a park ranger. During his time there, he develops an unusual affinity with and passion for the wolves in a local pack.

programme.title: A Different Sun
programme.desc: A Chinese family moves from their native land to a town in Germany and struggles to adjust to the different culture.

programme.title: The Colour of Darkness
programme.desc: All the colour, depth and mystery of Indias complex and riotous cultural heritage is brought to light in a single action which changes two countries forever.

programme.title: American Rescue Squad
programme.desc: A group of mysterious villains known as "The Alliance" sets a trap for the Taxpayer. They imprison him, torture him, and make plans to publicly crucify him.

programme.title: All in Time
programme.desc: Charlie quits his job to move home to manage his hometown rock band. His supportive girlfriend shares his love for the band, until struggles within the band force them to make choices that will impact their lives forever.

programme.title: Battle B-Boy
programme.desc: A group of talented but financially struggling B-Boys join an underground fighting ring in Downtown Los Angeles that uses Hip-Hop music and Break dancing to battle for money.

programme.title: Blissfully Unmarried
programme.desc: When a down and out divorced man wins a million dollars, his conniving ex-wife will stop at nothing to get her hands on the winnings.

programme.title: Astronaut: The Last Push
programme.desc: When a tragic accident cuts short the first manned mission to explore life on the moons of Jupiter, Michael Forrest must make the 3 year journey home to Earth in pure solitude.

programme.title: Cream Of The Crop
programme.desc: High-school Ag Science teacher Jodi Stafford meets commercial real-estate marketing specialist Mike Jared during her struggle to save her familys ailing dairy farm.

programme.title: The View From Here
programme.desc: After a bad review of his new restaurant, a Bay Area chef must learn to cope with his struggling relationship and the death of his father.

programme.title: Something Good Coming
programme.desc: After an unforeseen store closure, two grocery store workers from different backgrounds are stuck spending time together over a weekend.

programme.title: You with Me
programme.desc: It tells the story of Kim who lives with her overprotective parents and meets Jayson online. She then ends up moving to Seoul and starts a new life.

programme.title: Sugar!
programme.desc: A housewife of a Republican candidate for U.S. Senate secretly forms an all-women rock band turning her entire world up side down.

programme.title: Not Your Romeo and Juliet
programme.desc: With a popular romance column and a soul-mate, Micki has love all figured out -until a competing, anti-romance column rivals hers.

programme.title: Dog Park
programme.desc: Nick isnt lucky in love - until a trip to the Dog Park with his ex-girlfriends dog changes everything.

programme.title: Who Will Move The Stone
programme.desc: A worldly Detroit lawyer decides to represent a Born Again Christian on trial for the murder of a Catholic Priest.

programme.title: Lucky Louie
programme.desc: A retired cop teams up with four ex-convicts and a behavioral science student to solve a fifty year old bank robbery in this new faith filled family comedy.

programme.title: Slaughter Is The Best Medicine
programme.desc: A simple rendition turns into a blood bath as six veteran British commandoes try to capture a renegade scientist and unwittingly fall prey to the ultimate foe.

programme.title: Art Show Bingo
programme.desc: A talented young painter leaves the family self-storage business to pursue a life in the world of outdoor art shows.

programme.title: Across The Line
programme.desc: A small-town sheriff falls in love with a Latina illegal immigrant who witnessed a murder on the Texas border.

programme.title: Adolescents of Chymera
programme.desc: Based on actual events about the harsh realities of teenagers living life in a group home (where over 100,000 American juveniles live each year).

programme.title: The Way We Werent
programme.desc: A contemporary comedy about two people who meet just as their previous relationships have imploded in ugly fashion.

programme.title: Off the Menu
programme.desc: A just single, third generation of the big Tortilla Hut chain has to find a new dish for the chain. He meets a cute, superb chef in a New Mexican village restaurant.

programme.title: Someone I Used to Know
programme.desc: An overweight man meets a former classmate on their high school track. As the two grow close and inspire each other, their pasts creep back into their lives and begin to threaten all that they have developed.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Hiding in an attic doesn’t work out so well for a man who comes crashing through a ceiling. Cops stop a man with a broken car and a broken heart. Neighbors call the police when non-stop cussin’ interrupts their night.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E09 Crazy as a Loon
programme.desc: Officers conduct a traffic stop on a vehicle that ran a stop sign. Officers retrieve birds from a fireplace and release them outside. Officers conduct a drug-reversal-buy sting to capture buyers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E16 My Bills Wont Wait
programme.desc: A suspect calls the police and states that he wants to kill himself and any officer who tries to help him. None of the three occupants of a stopped car will admit to ownership of a bag of drugs. A man begs not to be arrested so that he can pay child support.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E20 Not My Text Messages
programme.desc: A routine traffic stop turns into a drug bust when cops turn up evidence of the drivers sizable habit. A suspicious man waiting in a parked car cant explain the incriminating texts on his phone. Two frequent flyers give officers a hard time when pulled over in a well-known drug area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A belligerent gun-toting man doesnt take too well to some harsh parental criticism. A bike rider tries to outpace a policeman then pretends to be someone else. Officers try to coax a rattled hit-and-run driver into coming clean.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E03 I Wont Be There for You
programme.desc: A suspect foolishly tries to elude police in a bright yellow sports car. Roommates aren’t always there for each other when police are called to break up a fight. No one in a stopped vehicle wants to admit to ownership of contraband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an armed robbery and carjacking, the suspects are arrested on several charges. A concerned sister reports a fight between her brother and a heavyset burglar. Officers pursue a stolen vehicle and a high speed chase ensues which ends in a wreck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, officers stop to talk to a young woman who appears to be soliciting prostitution. A father accuses his son of breaking his jaw. While running from officers, a suspect attempts to drop evidence on the street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drunk man threatens both firefighters and the police. Police are called over a dispute regarding an alleged missing dog. A drunk driver changes his story when his friend is found pinned under his car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers discover a grand theft auto suspect hiding in his apartment. Officers assist the fire department in capturing a brown bear from a palm tree. Officers respond to a shooting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A homeless man hides from deputies in the closet of an empty house. Officers called to a shooting find a man covered in blood. Deputies arrive to a domestic disturbance to find two brothers fighting over a pair of sandals.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An extremely understanding cop gives a resistant suspect too many chances. A driver reminds us why we should never let a friend borrow our car. A man with a supped-up vehicle tells an awful lie to police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E10 Tire Iron Road Rage
programme.desc: Officers respond to a traffic dispute involving an assault with a tire iron. Police are led to a battered woman after she dials 911. Officers on patrol encounter a couple engaged in prostitution.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect bites an Officer while trying to avoid arrest. An Officer responds to a stabbing. An Officer is flagged down by a concerned group looking for a missing 4-year-old.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A K-9 unit assists on a motorcycle pursuit turned foot chase gone awry. Officers investigate after noticing the garage door to an auto body shop is open. A pursuit involving a stolen vehicle driving on the wrong side of the freeway ends with an arrest.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman claims a man abused her then put a curse on her. Police arrest a man for having illegal drugs on him. An elderly woman locks herself in the restroom at a bank.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police use convenience store footage to make an arrest for burglary. Police attempt to help two neighbors reconcile their differences. Officers arrest a woman for domestic violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A patrolman plays linebacker when a fleeing thief runs right into him. Armed-robbery victims give a colorful play-by-play on surveillance footage of the crime. Officers have to get tearful children back to their estranged mother.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Despite driving a large SUV and trailer, a suspect tries to outrun the police. A driver tries to hide contraband on his person. Police are called into a domestic dispute involving a husband and wife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man assaults another man for groping his girlfriend. Police make several drug-related arrests while patrolling New Orleans. An adventurous suspect is arrested while scaling down a drainpipe.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E15 All The Worlds Our Bedroom
programme.desc: Officers are called to remove a man sleeping in a parking spot at Wal-Mart. A free-spirited couple takes their relationship to their front lawn. A resident brings a knife to a meeting with his building property manager.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E10 If You Hear Hooves
programme.desc: A woman needs police help when her boyfriend threatens her with a knife. A zebra runs loose on the streets of Sacramento County. A man wants to use a stick and a rock to settle a dispute.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An arrest is made in a buy-bust sting operation. An elderly man is questioned after reportedly kicking a juvenile in the face. A man is shot in the head by his roommate.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: At the conclusion of an extensive pursuit, the driver eventually loses control and runs into a stop sign. Officers stop a stolen vehicle leaving a known drug house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect in a traffic stop decides to handle the situation by screaming at the police. Officers have a close encounter with a suspect who admits that he has hidden contraband. A man’s clothing choices tip police off to possible criminal behavior.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E21 Hands Off The Junk
programme.desc: A passenger bails from a fleeing stolen vehicle then claims that he was only getting a ride. An undercover officer pulls a sting on a handsy prostitute. An anxious lady gets nabbed for weed after calling the police on her quarrelsome husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed pursuit ends in a foot chase. Stolen property is found in a suspect’s car during a traffic stop. An altercation ends with a brick being tossed at a victim’s car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a traffic accident after a man runs his truck through a wall. An undercover officer poses as a “john” and later a vehicle is stopped due to a missing license plate.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E31 When Ya Gotta Go
programme.desc: A man urinating in public flees from police on foot. A handgun is found in the vehicle of a driver who claims to be a student leaving class. Deputies find drugs in a man’s car when he runs a stop sign.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect uses bizarre driving techniques to elude cops. A tough officer wades through a forest of denial before finding the crack. Police search for man accused of shooting up the neighborhood.

programme.desc: Boy missing for a year has been spotted. An express driver disappears. Johnnys dad, also a cop, gets shot. Robert gets an A on his mid-term.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Ive Got A Siren!...
programme.desc: Connie helps a girl who is having a baby and is missing her boyfriend, while Bobby meets an actress who models herself on Lauren Bacall and has driven her husband away with her constant role-playing games.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Im Gonna Miss Him Too...
programme.desc: A young boy runs away from home, returning to take his little brother with him, after his potential stepfather steals from their home and blames it on him, and then threatens his life. Connie has to trace the family of an heroic John Doe who saved a little girls life, in order to find out what his medical problems are, and along the way feels some chemistry with the surgeon.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 What Do You Want... A Signed Confession?
programme.desc: Bobby is still under investigation for a suspected bribe and perverting the course of justice. Also a little girl is snatched in a department store.

programme.title: Missing Persons
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 If You Could Pick Your Own Parents...
programme.desc: Elderly man missing, wife attempts suicide. Group plans a holiday party for the lieutenant. Jumpers body hasnt been found and no ones reported him missing. Boy reports his mom is missing.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: Michael and Holly question a battered womans story after her abusive husband is murdered.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: A sexually molested stepdaughter is suspected in the stabbing death of her father.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: Chris becomes involved with a college prostitute as he and Rita attempt to solve the death of another.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 A Question of Faith
programme.desc: Tom and Cassy disagree over a psychic who claims to have knowledge of a murder.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 Fear and Loathing In Palm Beach
programme.desc: A suicide investigation exposes a noted therapists conspiracy to murder his wife.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: The death of a wealthy Palm Beach socialite leads Rita and Chris to a devious blackmail/extortion plot.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Was It Good For You Too?
programme.desc: Chris and Rita discover that a deranged woman planning to kill her lover is really part of an elaborate scheme to cover up the murder of a wealthy resident.

programme.title: The Return Of Hunter: Everyone Walks In L.A.
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Return Of Hunter: Everyone Walks In L.A.
programme.desc: Rick Hunters back. Hes considering marrying his girlfriend. But before he could, she is murdered.

programme.title: Scarlet Street
programme.desc: A man in mid-life crisis befriends a young woman, her fiance persuades her to con him.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: Tony winds up in one of his own jail cells when he runs afoul of an imperious judge whos hiding a fearsome secret.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: Tony winds up in one of his own jail cells when he runs afoul of an imperious judge whos hiding a fearsome secret.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: A notorious New York rackateer relocates to Eastbridge during the holiday season. Tony now has to be more concerned with peace on his own turf.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: When the majority of Tonys officers stage a sick-out in the wake of a wage dispute, Eastbridge becomes an open city for crime.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: Following the death of his gangster son in a police shootout, mobster Tommy Colette vows to kill Tony Scali himself.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 The Two Faces Of Ed
programme.desc: Tony is torn when a series of life-threatening incidents occur in Eastbridge and the only link appears to be Ed Mize, an old, mild-mannered friend currently experiencing marital difficulties.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Behind The Storm Door
programme.desc: Tony is pursued by a woman he suspects is filing false complaints.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Someone has been setting fires all over the city to empty warehouse, and Hunter and McCall are on the case.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter teams with two Metro officers to locate the missing profits of a murdered black-marketeer.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall attempt to break a cocaine syndicate apparently being run by one of Hunters ex-partners.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter pursues a package bomber whose ruthless methods are being used to kill the participants in his trial.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: A drug dealer is killed by a thief who stole Hunters "backup" gun. McCall must clear Hunters name.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate mysterious calls to a reporter about a series of murders.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: McCall goes undercover to help Hunter investigate the deaths of two models involved in pornographic films.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall find the murdered body of a call girl, and a toddler left unharmed in front of her tv set.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 The Beautiful and The Dead, Part 1
programme.desc: When a dead girl disappears from Hunters living room, he and McCall follow a trail of intrigue and murder.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter helps a policeman who is framed for the murder of his wife.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: When a convicted murderer commits suicide, his vengeful brother holds McCall and a judge shes dating captive.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 Requiem For Sergeant McCall
programme.desc: McCall is charged with murder when the prime suspect in her dead detective husbands case is found dead.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Son of a mobster, Detective Sergeant Rick Hunter and Sergeant Dee Dee McCall team up to catch a serial killer.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The disturbing missing case in Paris of a four year old.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On October 13th 1996, the body of young Angelique Dumetz, 18 years old, is recovered down a ditch in Oise forest. An important clue is found on the crime scene.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On February 23th 2017, policemen are alerted of the disapearrance of Brigitte Troadec, her husband Pascal, and their children Sebastien and Charlotte.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. Next to her was the lifeless body of her friend, Marina Studer. Who could have killed these two simple and wealthy widows? Clue after clue, the Swiss polices investigation would revolve around an environment of family jealousy and financial greed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: September 16 2005. The lifeless body of Audrey Jouannet, 24, is found hidden under the bed in her small apartment in Soisy-sur-Seine. It soon becomes apparent that the young woman has been tortured at length before being strangled. But surprisingly, though the highly meticulous murderer has taken care to leave no sign of his passage, the autopsy reveals traces of sperm on the victim. It will take all of the investigators intuition to pierce the mystery of this heinous crime...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: After an ordinary dinner, Pierre and Gabrielle Labrell suffer severe abdominal pains.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Nelly Cremel, 39, leaves her home to go jogging... never to return. Eight days later, after a vast search campaign, her body is found. Theres no doubt that its murder. The case soon ignites public opinion, even inflaming passions at the highest level of the state. The clues lead investigators on a number of trails, from the shadows of the French secret service to a manhunt for a possible sex maniac, in a case of murder most foul.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Willy Pomonti, a retired architect, is found savagely murdered in his opulent villa in La Celle-Saint-Cloud, near Paris. It soon becomes clear that the man has been tortured prior to death. At several points during this extraordinary enquiry, police will feel theyre holding the culprit... It will take them ten years to finally shed light on this particularly violent crime.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Arriving at her work, the secretary of a small firm in the suburbs of Geneva finds the body of Jean-Raymond Blatti, the companys new accountant. The man is lying in a pool of blood and, on his belly, the murderer has written "DIRTY RAPIST". Yet Jean-Raymond Blatti was never charged with sexual assault. Over the course of the investigation, this inscription will appear as one of the many mysteries of this case which is particularly rich in twists and turns.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 19th 2004, the naked and tied up body of a woman is recovered in the Ourcq canal in Fresnes-sur-Marne. The victim is impossible to identify.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On April 3th 2003, Chantal Ternik, a 48 year old housewife, is discovered hanged in her house of Sanary-sur-Mer, in Var.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers

programme.title: Trash
programme.desc: Many things come to mind when thinking about New York, but how the city deals with its garbage is usually not one of them. Here is how the city hauls away its trash.

programme.title: Sewage
programme.desc: New Yorkers create, on average, 1.3 billion gallons of wastewater per day that makes its way through 7,500 miles of pipes that make up the citys sewer system.

programme.title: Steam
programme.desc: Many dont know it, but New York is a city that runs on steam. Its one of the few cities that relies on this old technology to heat some of its most famous buildings.

programme.title: Bridges
programme.desc: New York has some of the most iconic bridges. These engineering marvels have helped set the tone for how bridges around the world are designed.

programme.title: Parks
programme.desc: New York City might be known as the concrete jungle, but its nearly 30,000 acres of park space have been an ever-present part of this bustling metropolis.

programme.title: Airports
programme.desc: New York has one of the busiest airspaces in the world. Here is how New Yorks airports have evolved to handle 140 million passengers each year.

programme.title: Electricity
programme.desc: Keeping the lights on in New York City is no easy task and as New York moves towards a greener future how we generate electricity will have to evolve.

programme.title: Water
programme.desc: Getting water from upstate reservoirs to the taps of over 8.5 million people in New York City is no easy feat.

programme.title: Rats
programme.desc: New York is known as one of the rattiest cities in America with an estimated population of close to 2 million rodents. Here is how New York City rats out its rodents.

programme.title: Taxis
programme.desc: The yellow taxi cab is the quintessential New York City ride. But today the threat of ride-share apps and city scandal has left cab drivers to face devastating debt.

programme.title: Trash
programme.desc: Many things come to mind when thinking about New York, but how the city deals with its garbage is usually not one of them. Here is how the city hauls away its trash.

programme.desc: New Yorkers create, on average, 1.3 billion gallons of wastewater per day that makes its way through 7,500 miles of pipes that make up the citys sewer system.

programme.title: Steam
programme.desc: Many dont know it, but New York is a city that runs on steam. Its one of the few cities that relies on this old technology to heat some of its most famous buildings.

programme.title: The Dogs of Hurricane Dorian
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug Thron takes his infrared drone from the hurricane-devastated Bahamas to the wildfire scorched hills of California, locating and rescuing dogs, horses, and more.

programme.title: Lost Dogs of Louisiana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: In the wake of Hurricane Laura, Doug heads to Louisiana to help a local firefighter find his lost dog and begin rescue operations in the hard-hit city of Lake Charles.

programme.title: 13 Days After Hurricane Laura
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: With the help of expert animal rescuer, Aja Estro, Doug continues his tireless search and rescue missions across the town of Lake Charles following Hurricane Laura.

programme.title: Oregon Fire Cats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug ventures into the charred neighborhoods of Talent, OR with an old friend, Shannon Jay, to save any of the unlucky felines left behind in the wildfire evacuations.

programme.title: Puerto Rico Rescue Pups
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug is called to Puerto Rico to help old friend and rescue partner, Aja Estro, with the massive stray dog population and hoarding cases across the island.

programme.title: Chasing Ghost
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug checks in on some of the dogs he’s rescued before turning his attention to the high desert outside LA and a boxer who’s spent 15 months fending for itself.

programme.title: Island Dogs
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: In our season opener, Doug takes his drone to the Dominican Republic to rescue puppies that have been abandoned in the municipal town dump.

programme.title: Urban Hyenas
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug travels to Malawi, in Central Africa, to work with hyena researchers who are eager to employ his drone. What the infrared camera shows them will surprise them all.

programme.title: Bats of Malawi
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: Doug visits Malawi, in Central Africa, to experiment in ways his drone can assist wildlife conservation research… pioneering work that can revolutionize field science.

programme.title: Dixie Fire Foxes
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: After the Dixie Fire devastates the CA town of Greenville, Doug heads in with his old friend Shannon to rescue the lost cats and wild animals that have been left behind.

programme.title: Tornado Town
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Doug to the Rescue
programme.desc: In the season finale, Doug takes his drone to the tornado-ravaged towns of Kentucky to rescue the slew of cats and dogs that have been lost in the brutal December storm.

programme.title: The Invention of Cooking
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The History of Food
programme.desc: Humans have depended on fire for millennia, but do we fully understand the impact it has had on our diet?

programme.title: The Agricultural Revolution
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The History of Food
programme.desc: From the first row of planted crops, the practice of agriculture rendered mans hunter-gatherer lifestyles obsolete in favor of settled life and stable food supplies.

programme.title: Fermentation, Preservation and Exploration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The History of Food
programme.desc: Just as humans have always sought food to survive, we have also sought the means to preserve that food. With preservation, we can plan for times of scarcity.

programme.title: The Industry of Food
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The History of Food
programme.desc: Over the brief span of the 20th century, agriculture underwent greater change than it had since it was first practiced some 12,000 years ago.

programme.title: The Future of Food
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The History of Food
programme.desc: Industrialized and processed food has dominated the last century. Now, the question is, whats next?

programme.title: The Foundations of Home - Structure and Shelter
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The History of Home Narrated by Nick Offerman
programme.desc: The History of Home is a story that is ever-changing, constantly being renovated and built upon. As homes changed, so too did our lives.

programme.title: The Hall, The Kitchen, The Dining Room, The Living Room
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The History of Home Narrated by Nick Offerman
programme.desc: Now that weve reviewed the fundamentals of shelter - the past, present, and future of materials - its time to step over the threshold and find out who is home.

programme.title: The Second Story - Private Life
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The History of Home Narrated by Nick Offerman
programme.desc: In the final episode, The History of Home will focus on private life by exploring the history of three rooms; The study, the bedroom, and the bathroom.

programme.title: The Invention of Cooking
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The History of Food
programme.desc: Humans have depended on fire for millennia, but do we fully understand the impact it has had on our diet?

programme.title: The Agricultural Revolution
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The History of Food
programme.desc: From the first row of planted crops, the practice of agriculture rendered mans hunter-gatherer lifestyles obsolete in favor of settled life and stable food supplies.

programme.title: Fermentation, Preservation and Exploration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The History of Food
programme.desc: Just as humans have always sought food to survive, we have also sought the means to preserve that food. With preservation, we can plan for times of scarcity.

programme.title: The Industry of Food
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The History of Food
programme.desc: Over the brief span of the 20th century, agriculture underwent greater change than it had since it was first practiced some 12,000 years ago.

programme.title: The Future of Food
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The History of Food
programme.desc: Industrialized and processed food has dominated the last century. Now, the question is, whats next?

programme.title: Asteroid Belt Discovery
programme.desc: New evidence from NASAs Dawn mission to Ceres, a dwarf planet the size of Texas.

programme.title: Gravitational Waves
programme.desc: Einstein was correct about gravitational waves. Here is a short primer on these up-to-now only theoretical waves.

programme.title: What is CRISPR?
programme.desc: On July 5, 1996, scientists cloned a sheep, Dolly. Now genetics have advanced to gene editing. Promising to pave the way for curing genetically carried illnesses.

programme.title: The Mystery Of The Longest Living Vertebrate
programme.desc: New information from the eye of the Greenland Shark confirms it is the longest living vertebrate on Earth.

programme.title: Exoplanets
programme.desc: NASA may have just gotten one step closer to answering the question: are we alone? The Spitzer Telescope has made a groundbreaking discovery of exoplanets.

programme.title: Cassini: The Grand Finale
programme.desc: Twenty years after its launch, we bid farewell to the Cassini spacecraft as it plunges into Saturn’s atmosphere in a planned death spiral.

programme.title: Gravitational Waves: Rewinding Time
programme.desc: Gravitational waves from three billion light years away have reached Earth -- the latest discovery from a new branch of astronomy.

programme.title: The Eighth Continent: Zealandia
programme.desc: Geologists in New Zealand created a stir earlier this year when they declared their discovery of the eighth continent of the world. Learn how was it formed and how something so massive could remain undetected until now.

programme.title: Homo Naledi
programme.desc: Discovered in 2013, new and puzzling finding of small-skulled fossils of Homo naledi.

programme.title: The Earliest Americans
programme.desc: New evidence suggests humans arrived in North America far earlier than previously thought, and that they may have traveled along paths now buried deep beneath the sea.

programme.title: Reversing Alzheimers
programme.desc: As the number of people affected by Alzheimers Disease continues to grow at an unprecedented pace, researchers worldwide are racing to discover a cure.

programme.title: Asteroids, Comets, and Meteors
programme.desc: How do these objects differ from one another, if at all? Nick Moskovitz, an astronomer at the Lowell Observatory, compares these two space solar system bodies.

programme.title: Mars InSight: Seven Minutes to Touchdown
programme.desc: The fate of the Mars InSight lander will all come down to a fiery seven-minute freefall into the Red Planet. Will it survive?

programme.title: New Horizons: The Kuiper Belt Target
programme.desc: The New Horizons spacecraft revolutionized our understanding of the solar system as it rocketed past Pluto. Now, the craft approaches its next target…Ultima Thule.

programme.title: Direct From An Asteroid
programme.desc: The Hayabusa2 spacecraft has just completed one of the most intricate procedures in space exploration.

programme.title: Little Foot: Exploring Our Origins
programme.desc: One of the oldest known hominins in southern Africa. An almost complete skeleton dates back more than three million years.

programme.title: Recovering From Extinction
programme.desc: How long does it take for life to rebound after a major mass extinction? Scientists in Svalbard dig through fossil clues for surprising revelations about our Earths history.

programme.title: Shark Family Tree
programme.desc: Great white sharks are one of the most feared predators on Earth, and yet we know very little about them. Science is now revealing the mysteries.

programme.title: Fixing A Broken Heart
programme.desc: Heart disease is the number one cause of deaths worldwide, but there are researchers frantically working to change that. Meet the people inventing the future of cardia...

programme.title: Herculaneum Scrolls: Unraveling History
programme.desc: The eruption of Mount Vesuvius is renowned for its decimation of Pompeii, but nearby, an equally impressive Roman settlement known as Herculaneum was lost to history.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in America - Suuri gangsterisota
programme.desc: Tarina kahdesta New Yorkista kotoisin olevasta lapsuudenystavasta, joista tulee varakkaita ja vaikutusvaltaisia gangstereita 1920-luvun aikana. Kumpikaan ei kykene tyydyttamaan syvimpia haaveitaan tai himojaan, ja heidan tiensa erkanevat rajahtavan vakivaltaisesti tavalla, josta selviaa totuus vasta 35 vuotta myohemmin.

programme.title: The Greatest
programme.desc: Allen ja Grace Brewerin vanhin poika on kuollut auto-onnettomuudessa. Yhtakkiaovikello soi, ja oven takana on Rose. Han vaittaa tunteneensa pojan ja kantavansahanen lastaan. Tieto saa perheen etaantymaan toisistaan. Voiko kauheista onnettomuuksista seurata kuitenkin jotain hyvaa?

programme.title: Kesahetket (Summer Hours)
programme.desc: Helène on suvun matriarkka, joka on omistanut elamansa taiteen ja antiikkiesineiden keraamiselle. Kun hanen elamansa lopulta paattyy, hanen kolme lastaan saavat suuren perinnon kauniin vanhan maalaistalon ja kaiken siihen kuuluvan muodossa, mutta lapset ovat kaikkea muuta kuin yhta mielta siita, miten perintokohteita tulisi hallita. Kesahetket on Kultainen palmu -voittaja Olivier Assayasin vakeva perhedraama, jonka rooleissa nahdaan Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling ja Jeremie Renier.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Felix Greystonen elakeikaan olisi viela tovi, mutta firma painostaa Felixin aikaistetulle elakkeelle. Laksiaislahjaksi han saa alylasit, jotka herattavat kayttajan suurimmat haaveet eloon. Kun Felixin vaimon ura on nousukiidossa ja tytar itsenaistymassa, mies huomaa tuntevansa itsensa kovin yksinaiseksi. Paetakseen piinaavaa yksinaisyytta Felix ajautuu yha syvemmalle alylasiensa maailmaan, joka hiertaa entisestaan Felixin suhdetta etaantyneeseen perheeseensa.

programme.title: Brain On Fire
programme.desc: Susannah Cahalan on hiljattain valmistunut yliopistosta ja elaa unelmaelamaa New Yorkissa. Han on lupaava toimittaja New York Postin toimituksessa ja rakastunut muusikko Stepheniin. Lisaksi esimies on antanut hanelle toimeksiannon, joka mahdollistaa uran lapilyonnin, joten kaikki on kohdallaan. Pian asiat alkavat kuitenkin luisua kasista. Susannah sairastuu sitkeaan flunssaan, unohtaa asioita ja myohastyy aikatauluistaan. Han kuulee ihmisten puhuvan selkansa takana, on varma, etta Stephen tapailee toista naista eika pysty hallitsemaan kehoaan. Ja tilanne pahenee; Susannah alkaa saada voimakkaita kohtauksia ja hanen yha psykoottisemmaksi kayva kaytoksensa vaatii jatkuvaa valvontaa.

programme.title: Beatrix Potter
programme.desc: Han on ihastuttanut monia sukupolvia, mutta hanen elamansa on ollut salaisuus. Tahan saakka. Beatrix Potter on 30-vuotias sinkkunainen aikana, jolloin naisen kunnioitettavin tehtava on menna hyviin naimisiin. Kukaan, ei edes Beatrixin oma perhe, ymmarra sita, etta Beatrix haluaa mieluummin piirtaa ja kertoa tarinoita elaimista. Kaikki menee pieleen, kun Beatrix tapaa kokemattoman kustantajan Norman Waynen, joka rakastuu korviaan myoten niin Beatrixin ainutlaatuisiin tarinoihin kuin itse Beatrixiinkin. Beatrix joutuu mahdottomaan tilanteeseen, jossa hanen pitaa irrottautua perheen tukahduttavasta otteesta.

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: White Oleander
programme.desc: Astrid on 15-vuotias tytto, jonka elama muuttuu peruuttamattomalla tavalla, kun poliisi saapuu pidattamaan hanen aitiaan. Ingrid-aiti paatyy telkien taakse murhattuaan poikaystavansa ja alaikainen Astrid aloittaa oman kujanjuoksunsa. Sijaiskoti toisensa jalkeen tulee tutuksi kapinalliselle teini-ikaiselle, joka yrittaa epatoivoisesti loytaa oman identiteettinsa ihmisten ja maisemien alati vaihtuessa hanen ymparillaan. Astridin tavatessa pojan nimelta Paul heraa toivo, etta myos ystavyydella ja rakkaudella voisi olla sijaa hanen elamassaan.

programme.title: JFK - Avoin tapaus
programme.desc: New Orleansin piirisyyttaja Jim Garrison ottaa tehtavakseen tutkia presidentti John F. Kennedyn murhaa Dallasissa, Texasissa vuonna 1963. Se, mita han saa selville, saa hanet epailemaan, etta tarinassa on muutakin kuin julkisuuden versio.

programme.title: Black Coal, Thin Ice
programme.desc: Pohjois-Kiinassa vuonna 1999 eraassa pikkukaupungissa loydetaan useita ruumiita. Kaksi poliisivirkailijaa kuolee ja yksi loukkaantuu vakavasti verisessa yhteenotossa, kun epailtya murhaajaa yritetaan ottaa kiinni. Eloon jaanyt poliisi Zhang Zili joutuu luopumaan virastaan ja loytaa tyopaikan tehtaan vartijana. Viisi vuotta myohemmin tapahtuu jalleen useita mysteerisia murhia. Entinen kollega apunaan Zhang alkaa itse tutkia tapausta. Palkitun ohjaajan Diao Yinanin kolmas elokuva on film noir -trilleri, jonka paaosissa esiintyvat Fan Liao, Lun Mei Gwei ja Xuebing Wang. Elokuva voitti vuoden 2014 Berliinin elokuvajuhlien Kultaisen karhun ja Hopeisen karhun.

programme.title: Candy
programme.desc: Candy (Abbie Cornish) ja Dan (Heath Ledger) rakastavat toisiaan ja heroiinia, joka tuntuu vain lisaavan heidan keskinaista onneaan. Mikaan ei voi menna pieleen, kunhan heilla on toisensa. Avioliitto ja lapsi vain lujittavat sidetta. Mutta vahitellen harmiton tapa saa yliotteen ja uhkaa tuhota pienen paratiisin. Candyn vanhemmat ja Danin ystava Casper (Geoffrey Rush) alkavat menettaa toivonsa pariskunnan vajotessa yha syvemmalle omaan rakkauden ja heroiinin savyttamaan maailmaansa...

programme.title: Once Were Warriors
programme.desc: Heken perheessa ei ole rauhallista hetkea. Jake Heke on vakivaltainen humalassa, toinen poika on liittynyt katujengiin ja toinen odottaa syytteita. Beth-aidilla ja lapsilla on edessaan vaikea mutta elintarkea paatos: jaada toivottomaan tilanteeseen tai rikkoa kahleensa. Kerran sotureita on palkittu perhedraama menneisyyden hyvaksymisesta ja tulevaisuuden luomisesta.

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: Brittisotilas Jody joutuu IRA:n sieppaamaksi. Jodyn ja hanen vartijansa Fergusin valille muodostuu ystavyyssuhde. Kun Jodyn vapauttamiselle asetetut ehdot eivat toteudu, juuri Fergus maarataan teloittamaan Jody. Tehtava osoittautuu vaikeaksi Fergusille. Fergus pakenee ja aloittaa uuden elaman Lontoossa. Myos Jodyn aiempi elama kietoutuu Fergusin elamaan. The Crying Game on Oscar-palkittu jannityselokuva. Paaosissa Forest Whitaker, Stephen Rea ja Jaye Davidson.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: Varastetut lapset
programme.desc: Kolme puoliksi valkoihoista ja puoliksi aboriginaalia tyttoa koulutetaan tyoskentelemaan kotiapulaisina valkoisissa perheissa ja heita valmistellaan menemaan naimisiin valkoihoisten miesten kanssa. Mutta tytot paattavat paeta, ja he lahtevat seuraamaan yli 1 500 mailin pituista osavaltion raja-aitaa mullistavassa seikkailussa Australian eramaassa.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Vuonna 1961 Neuvostoliiton ensimmainen ydinsukellusvene lahtee ensimmaiselle matkalleen Pohjois-Atlantille. Mutta sukellusvene ei toimi optimaalisesti, ja koska ydinreaktorissa ilmenee ongelmia, silla on katastrofaaliset seuraukset miehistoon. Miehiston on taisteltava yhdessa ydinkatastrofin valttamiseksi, joka on seka hengenvaarallinen etta voi aloittaa uuden maailmansodan suurvaltojen valilla.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: Laitakaupungin valot
programme.desc: Laitakaupungin valot kertoo yovartijana tyoskentelevasta Koistisesta, joka joutuu petoksen uhriksi. Laitakaupungin valot oli mukana vuoden 2006 Cannesin elokuvajuhlien kansainvalisessa kilpasarjassa. Elokuva palkittiin parhaan elokuvan Jussi-palkinnolla vuonna 2007. Lisaksi Timo Salminen voitti Jussin parhaasta kuvauksesta ja Markku Patila parhaasta lavastuksesta.

programme.title: In Tranzit
programme.desc: Toisen maailmansodan paatyttya joukko saksalaisia sotavankeja lahetetaan leningradilaiselle vankileirille. Leirin naistyontekijat vihaavat heidan miehensa ja poikansa tappaneita saksalaisia yli kaiken ja valmistautuvat nyt kostoon.

programme.title: The Good Heart
programme.desc: Kohtalo ja viides sydankohtaus heittavat akaisen, mutta sydamellisen Jacquesin elamaan nuoren Lucasin, jolle mies paattaa luovuttaa baarinsa asiakkaineen. Naisia ei anniskelupaikassa kaivata, ja miesten ystavyys joutuukin koetukselle Lucasin rakastuessa kauniiseen Apriliin.

programme.title: Main Street
programme.desc: Pohjois-Carolinassa sijaitsevan pikkukaupungin kuviot menevat uusiksi, kun kaupunkiin muuttaa karismaattinen muukalainen. Han suunnittelee kuolevan kaupungin elvyttamista, mutta suunnitelmat eivat ole kaikkien asukkaiden mieleen. Ainakaan mikaan ei palaa enaa ennalleen...

programme.title: The Truth Commissioner
programme.desc: Totuuskomissaari paljastaa synkkia salaisuuksia Pohjois-Irlannissa, missa valta ja menneisyys tormaavat oikeuden ja sovinnon puolesta.

programme.title: Koston liekki
programme.desc: Rankasti ryyppaava, loppuunpalanut CIA:n agentti John Creasy (Denzel Washington) on luopunut toivosta elamansa suhteen – kunnes hanet palkataan yhdeksanvuotiaan Pita Ramosin (Dakota Fanning) henkivartijaksi. Pala palalta Creasyn sisin alkaa eheytya, mutta kun Pita kidnapataan, paasee Creasyn tukahdutettu raivo valloilleen eika han pysahdy ennen kuin teko on kostettu. Loppuun asti.

programme.title: Take Shelter
programme.desc: Cannesissa palkitussa elokuvassa ohiolainen Curtis viettaa rauhallista elamaa vaimonsa ja kuuron tyttarensa kanssa, mutta nakee piinaavan todentuntuisia enneunia uhkaavasta myrskysta. Mielenterveyttaan epaillen mies hakeutuu laakarin puheille, mutta unien jatkuessa han alkaa varautua vanhaa maanalaista myrskysuojaa parantelemalla. Onko puhuri sittenkaan todella tulossa ja tarvitseeko Curtisin perhe lopulta suojaa myrskytuulilta vai Curtisilta itseltaan?

programme.title: House of Sand and Fog
programme.desc: Kathyn elama on riekaleina. Hanen miehensa on jattanyt hanet, ja hanen isaltaan perimansa talo on otettu hanelta pois vaarista syista. Talon uuden omistajan aikeet eivat ole pahat, mutta oikeusriita on vaistamaton. Konflikti, joka vain upottaa kaikki mukana olevat entista syvemmalle suohon. Kolminkertainen Oscar-ehdokas House of Sand and Fog on psykologinen draama perhetragedioista ja amerikkalaisesta unelmasta, ja elokuvan paarooleissa nahdaan Jennifer Connelly (Kaunis mies, Unelmien sielunmessu) ja Ben Kingsley (Gandhi, Schindlerin lista).

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

The young man had been missing for two weeks and no one had seen him since the evening of his graduation ceremony from his engineering school. A theory soon emerged: the very drunk student had fallen over thea bridge over the canal which led to his death. But his parents and relatives did not believe this.

programme.title: LIVE - Argentina v Colombia | Semi-finals | FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™
programme.desc: Six time champions Argentina reach their 9th semi-final in the tournament with a perfect record, winning all of their match including a convincing win over Mexico in the last round. Colombia was able to overcome Spain in the quarter-finals in a 5-goal thriller, thanks to Villareals hat-trick. The last meeting between the two was in the Round of 16 of the 2005 edition, which ended in a 2-1 win for Argentina.
