programme.desc: A mans wife took her own life and his college sweetheart killed herself the same way. Was it coincidence?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of an attractive young woman was found a mile from her abandoned car. Police were especially concerned when they realized the victim had come to them for protection just two weeks earlier.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: One warm summer afternoon, the town of Verona, Wisconsin faced its first triple homicide. To solve the case, investigators had to delve into the world of high rollers and offshore betting.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Volunteers and police spend weeks searching for a missing girl. A psychic later leads them to a field where the body was found.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On May 12, 1994, Crystal Perry was viciously murdered in her home in Bridgton, Maine. Michael Hutchinson, 32, was found guilty of murder in the 1994 slaying at Perrys home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The prime suspect had a criminal record and his drivers license was found at the scene of a brutal double homicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a hit-and-run boating accident caused a death, police must search for one boat among 1200 others.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The killer probably hoped to cover his tracks by staging the crime scene. But investigators saw through the attempt almost immediately.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1987, the death of Crystal Purcell was considered an accident. Then in 2001, Barbara Purcell called police to suggest that her estranged husband had killed Crystal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Tracey Frame, 35, was convicted of killing David Nixon in April 2002 after he planned to end their relationship.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, Grand Junction, Colorado is on edge after a series of deadly bombings kill two people and injure one more. Police race to find the culprit before he strikes again.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An 82-year-old woman was found dead. Clues on the victims body would tell police what happened that night.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a college student is reported missing, police believe their investigation will be like countless others.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of a young girl was discovered on isolated farmland near Delano, California. She had no ID, but police found mailbox keys in the pocket of her jeans.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2001, Ginger Hayes and her infant son Nicholas were abducted during a carjacking and the crime had been reported by a witness within minutes of occurrence.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A bomb, constructed to cause as much damage as possible, kills a victim with deadly force and flame. When a search yields some tiny clues, police are able to identify the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A security guard disappeared from his post without a trace; his remains were found a year later in a remote camp site.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 1999, Susan Fassett was gunned down as she left her church choir practice in Poughkeepsie, NY. After clearing her husband, police turned their attention to Fred Andros, with whom Susan had an affair.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The body of a college co-ed was found on a farm covered with her own denim as well as the jeans of the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 2003, Tiffany Rowell and three of her friends were brutally murdered in affluent Clear Lake, Texas.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Derrick Duehren returned to find his Oregon home burned to the ground. His wifes charred remains were later found in the rubble.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl went missing from her Colorado home and the only evidence the kidnapper left behind was three fingerprints on a window screen.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Detectives search for the bombers of two churches in Illinois, hoping that the materials used in the remnants of the handmade bombs will offer the clues to catch the culprits.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Seattle police had no suspects in the violent murder of post-grunge singer, Mia Zapata. More than a decade passed before the evidence could be used by forensic scientists to identify the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a dedicated, well-respected teacher disappeared, police had to determine if shed gone on vacation without telling anyone, or if she was the victim of foul play.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 2007, the Florida mobile home of Effie and Michael Ratley catches fire. Michael heroically rescues his wife and infant son. A month later, his wife is found beaten to death in a bedroom of his parents home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police dont have a basis for comparison to match shoe impressions, blood drops and DNA evidence from a murder scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Russian immigrant is found dead and a strange phone call to his office is the only lead investigators have.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 1993, young mother Tammy Tatum was sexually assaulted and murdered in her Longmont, Colorado apartment.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After the suspect was convicted of murder, he maintained his innocence through his 25 years in prison.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a wealthy socialite died after falling down the stairs, witness accounts contradicted evidence. Investigators employed a physicist and an expert in accident reconstruction.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man was killed in a car crash, but the evidence led investigators to believe it was not an accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The victim has been stabbed more than thirty times, and the crime scene is awash with her blood. Near her head, police discover a distinctive button with strands of thread still attached.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: When Kristine Fitzhugh failed to show up for her music class, her husband found her dead at the bottom of the stairs of their Palo Alto home. Further investigation reveals evidence of murder in the kitchen.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 100 Last Heavyweight Standing
programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 103: Last Heavyweight Standing main event features Levi Rigters (19-3, 9 KO) colliding with Jamal Ben Saddik (38-10, 29 KO) to see who moves on in the tournament. Among the other names taking part in Phase Two are Nabil Khachab (29-6-1, 4 KO), Iancu Ionut (31-11, 13 KO), Rade Opacic (21-7, 16 KO), Milos Cvjeticanin (13-4, 9 KO), Sofian Laidouni (39-5-1, 20 KO), and many more. In addition, Chico Kwasi (44-5-2, 23 KO) will defend his GLORY welterweight world title against Mehdi Ait El Hadj (35-4-2, 8 KO), Mory Kromah (34-3-1, 20 KO) returns and takes on Cristian Ristea (44-26, 13 KO) in a heavyweight match-up outside the tournament, and Tayfun Ozcan (88-11-3, 28 KO) clashes with rival...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E07 GLORY 102 Featherweight Grand Prix
programme.desc: Four more will punch their tickets into the next round as GLORY and RISE search for the baddest featherweight on the planet in this year long tournament. On the GLORY side, top ranked German Polish fighter Denis Wosik (40-9-1, 9 KO) takes on Thai veteran Suarek (107-40-11, 39 KO) and Italy’s Achraf Aasila (53-13, 13 KO) meets France’s Lounis Saing (19-4-1, 12 KO). Meanwhile on the RISE side of the bracket, Japan’s Yutaro Asahi (17-9, 4 KO) clashes with Spain’s Eduardo Catalin (17-3-1) and top Japanese prospect Yura Kono (15-1, 7 KO) goes up against China’s Dexiang Kong (35-10). In addition to the Last Featherweight Standing matchups, Shiro Matsumoto (53-17-4, 18 KO) defends his RISE...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY makes its debut in Turkey with GLORY 6: Istanbul. The main event features a super fight between Gokhan Saki against Daniel Ghiță. The event features 14 more fights with the likes of Joseph Valtellini, Filip Verlinden, Nieky Holzken, and Fabiano Cyclone among others.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E07 GLORY 102 Featherweight Grand Prix
programme.desc: Four more will punch their tickets into the next round as GLORY and RISE search for the baddest featherweight on the planet in this year long tournament. On the GLORY side, top ranked German Polish fighter Denis Wosik (40-9-1, 9 KO) takes on Thai veteran Suarek (107-40-11, 39 KO) and Italy’s Achraf Aasila (53-13, 13 KO) meets France’s Lounis Saing (19-4-1, 12 KO). Meanwhile on the RISE side of the bracket, Japan’s Yutaro Asahi (17-9, 4 KO) clashes with Spain’s Eduardo Catalin (17-3-1) and top Japanese prospect Yura Kono (15-1, 7 KO) goes up against China’s Dexiang Kong (35-10). In addition to the Last Featherweight Standing matchups, Shiro Matsumoto (53-17-4, 18 KO) defends his RISE...

programme.title: Cjamango
programme.desc: Just when Cjamango has won a bag of gold in a poker game, he is attacked by the gangs of El Tigre and Don Pablo.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: In 1906, on Oklahomas Indian lands, a cowboy fights for oil lease rights against a greedy oilman while a pretty schoolteacher steals both mens hearts.

programme.title: The Mercenary
programme.desc: A greedy Polish mercenary aids a mine worker and peasant girl as they lead a revolution against the oppressive Mexican Government, and are pursued by an American rival.

programme.title: Stranger On Horseback
programme.desc: Circuit judge Rick Thorne arrives in Bannerman and uncovers that rancher Josiah Bannerman and his family control the town. After Tom Bannerman kills a man with no consequence, Thorne steps in and arrests him. As he seeks allies, including Amy Lee, the ranchers niece, Thorne faces pursuit, betrayal, and the challenge of getting Tom to trial.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter in Trinity
programme.desc: The townsfolk of Trinity decide to hire a notorious bounty hunter to protect them from a fierce band of Mexican outlaws who are terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E33-35
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Western legends Pat Garrett, Doc Holliday and Billy the Kid are played against each other over the law and the attentions of vivacious country vixen Rio McDonald.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp S01E17-20
programme.desc: In one of televisions first adult Westerns, the famous marshal puts his life on the line to maintain order, first in Dodge City, Kan., then in Tombstone, Ariz.

programme.title: The Man from Utah
programme.desc: In a horse-riding rodeo contest bad guys want John Weston to lose. When he doesnt go along they add some insurance: a poisoned needle just under his saddle.

programme.title: The Godless Ones
programme.desc: An outlaw and a bounty hunter are searching for Mexican bandit Corbancho, who is running the El Paso area, and has also robbed the Bank of Tuscon of $400,000.

programme.title: A Few Dollars for Django
programme.desc: Regan, a bounty hunter longing for a new life and perhaps a role as sheriff, is pulled back into action when a murder sets him on the trail of bank robbers. This pursuit thrusts him into a violent range war between farmers and cattlemen, forcing him to choose between his desire for peace and the harsh reality of his past.

programme.title: Colorado Sundown
programme.desc: Rancher helps a friend claim a spread hes inherited, only to get involved in his murder.

programme.title: More Dead Than Alive
programme.desc: Released from prison after 18 years, notorious gunslinger Killer Cain is a peaceful reformed man but the Old West has died and he cannot adapt to the modern West where some unpaid moral debts and old troubles resurface.

programme.title: Shotgun
programme.desc: Deputy U.S. Marshal Clay Hardin plans to retire and take a commissioner role, but when the notorious Ben Thompson kills a fellow marshal, Clay abandons his new path—and his girl—to hunt the gang. Joined by a bounty hunter and a captivating half-breed woman, he ventures into Apache land, uncovering a deadly plot to arm the tribes with repeating rifles.

programme.title: Django, Prepare a Coffin
programme.desc: A gunfighter forms a gang of "deceased" execution victims to get revenge on the politician and outlaw who killed his wife.

programme.title: The Animals
programme.desc: A woman tracks down the three men who raped her, helped by an Apache. Traveling through the Old West to her new home, young schoolteacher Alice McAndrew is abducted by five outlaws headed by robber Pudge Elliott. The thugs rape Alice before leaving her for dead, but she is rescued by Chatto, an Apache chief. He restores her health and aids her in her bloodthirsty quest for revenge. With her sanity wavering, will Alice be able to find the men who tortured her?

programme.title: Beyond The Law
programme.desc: A trio of thieves plot to steal a towns silver shipment but a turn of events makes them the towns heroes.

programme.title: They Call Him Cemetery
programme.desc: John and George McIntire are a couple of naive brothers who travel to a lawless western town to see their father.

programme.title: Long Live ... Your Death!
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed Russian prince, a Mexican bandit and a radical Irish female journalist team up during the Mexican Revolution to find fortune and notoriety.

programme.title: Sabata the Killer
programme.desc: Sabata and Mangosta are bank robbers, who after a bank job, through a series of events, end up teaming up with the bank clerk, Peter. They then go on the run with Peters boss and a hired posse equipped with the latest technology in weapons on their trail.

programme.title: Django Kill... If You Live, Shoot!
programme.desc: Various factions, feud over stolen gold in a surreal town.

programme.title: Shadow of Sartana
programme.desc: Sartana has a bounty on his head and hes wanted dead or alive. To eliminate this he makes a deal with the local politicians. If he hunts down the marauding Randal Brothers, the bounty will be removed.

programme.title: Massacre
programme.desc: A gang of gunrunners is pursued by Mexican Rurales and Yaqui Indians. The police want to stop the tribes from attacking farmers, while the Yaqui seek revenge for bad medicine that blinded their children. Both groups capture the criminals but find themselves trapped by angry tribes at a ruined mission. Can cops and criminals unite to survive?

programme.title: In Old New Mexico
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid and Pancho kidnap Ellen Roth, a woman accused of murder, and take her to a mission. She claims her innocence, revealing a mysterious doctor who caused a death. Cisco believes her and plans to expose the truth. He strikes a deal with Bill Hastings for part of an inheritance, but the stakes rise when a new plot unfolds.

programme.title: Requiescant
programme.desc: The adopted son of a preacher comes upon a village that is under the thumb of a deranged ex-Confederate officer, who is - among other things - stealing land from the locals with phony land grants.

programme.title: Fifteen Scaffolds for the Killer
programme.desc: Accused of a hideous crime they did not commit, the members of two rivaling gangs, persecuted by a bloodthirsty lynch mob, take refuge in an abandoned fort, taking two hostages with them.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger and the Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: Three Indians are murdered. Each was wearing a medallion when he died.

programme.title: Gunsight Ridge
programme.desc: Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.

programme.title: Long Days of Hate
programme.desc: A bounty, Benson is hunting down a vicious outlaw gang, who killed his parents, brother and sisters, except for one sister, Susy, who he wants for himself!

programme.title: Promise
programme.desc: Ransom, a retired scout, must face his tragic past to find peace. Seeking answers about his lost love Tess and her daughter Promise, he learns of a hidden cash box tied to his past. As ex-Confederates and the dangerous Wildeye hunt for the treasure, Ransom and Promise join forces, navigating gunfights, betrayal, and an intense showdown.

programme.title: Panhandle
programme.desc: John Sands, a former Texas marshal turned fugitive, hides in Mexico after his gun skills made him an outlaw. When he learns his brother Billy, a crusading newspaperman, has been murdered in Sentinel, Texas, John risks his life to return north. Despite the bounty on his head, he’s determined to uncover the truth and avenge his brother’s death.

programme.title: Killer Goodbye
programme.desc: A young man goes back to his hometown ten years after killing the killer of his parents. Once there he is asked to help the sheriff.

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Thailand, France, Sweden, Italy
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Thailand - Carrot Pad Thai, France - Ground Cherry Salad, Sweden - Swedish Pecan Balls, and Italy - Corn Farroto!

programme.title: Gustos QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TVs top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, were serving up 8 of our most popular cake recipes, from hosts like Siobhan Detkavich and Michael Bonacini.

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite meals – Roast Chicken Dinner! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite dishes – Chicken Parmesan! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Bring On The Karbs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Where in the World Are You

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Pork was Made for Barbeques
programme.desc: Pork and the grill are good buddies and host Spencer Watts shows us four of his favourite pork recipes that will have you salivating.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser thats easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: Blitz!
programme.desc: BLITZ! is an all-new cooking show! Imagine being next Erica Karbelnik as they cook their fav dishes!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on bitter sauces! First up, a duo of chimichurris - one with black garlic! Next, a stout and espresso gravy for lamb and a traditional Georgian walnut sauce!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on fatty sauces! First up, patatas bravas with aioli and brava sauce! Next, classic sauce choron on crab cakes and a duck fat-blood orange emulsion with duck confit!

programme.title: Zach Kinda Cooks
programme.desc: Lazy and curmudgeonly chef and ex-Gusto writer Zach cooks one of his all-time favorite dishes – Jjangmyeon! While cooking, he tells aimless stories, cracks bad jokes, and berates Sydney, the beleaguered camera person.

programme.title: Flour Power
programme.desc: Baking is indulgent - especially when making rich and delicious treats! Host Jessica McGovern shares some foolproof recipes for all things rich.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Where in the World Are You
programme.desc: Chefs Erica and Josh Karbelnik go head-to-head to see who can come up with the most tantalizing international menu! Josh makes dishes from Thailand while Erica prepares a South Korean meal!

programme.title: Generation Cooks
programme.desc: Aspiring kid Chefs make pancakes, Liam whips up craveable chicken coconut curry, Jae-Anthony and his father Wendell make Nashville fried chicken sandwiches, and more!

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Pasta, bread, pizza dough! Host Michael Bonacini makes Apulian classics like Artichoke Cheese Panzerotti.

programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: Spices were meant to be used in tandem, and our co-hosts Jasmin Ibrahim and Shahir Massoud will show you how! Cook along as they make a creamy, golden, Risotto Milanese, spiced not just with saffron, but with Ras el Hanout: a spice blend like no other! Next, a master class in spice blends and infusing them into oils, all topped off with some skewers of plump, juicy grilled shrimp. Finally, delicate Red Snapper is coated in aromatic Dukkah and served with a fresh Tomato and Chickpea Salad!

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: The Italian region Campania is known for its seafood and pizza. Famed Chef Michael Bonacini prepares classics like Margherita Pizza and Fried Seafood.

programme.title: Gustos QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TVs top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, were serving up 8 of our most popular cake recipes, from hosts like Siobhan Detkavich and Michael Bonacini.

programme.title: Spencers Big 30
programme.desc: Chef Spencer Watts prepares quick, easy, and delicious dishes like Skillet Lasagna, Creamed Spinach, and Banana Ice Cream in under 30 minutes.

programme.title: Spencers Big 30
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Fish and Chips Night
programme.desc: 30-minute meals have never tasted this good! Chef Spencer Watts offers up some secrets for the perfect fish and chips dinner.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Pailin Chongchitnant introduces us to some of her favourite and simple Thai dishes like Hot and Sour Soup and a decadent Beef Panang Curry.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Argentinian host, Natalia Machado, exquisitely prepares delicious dishes from Argentina including lamb two different ways.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Gnocchi, polenta, pesto, oh my! Warm host Vanessa Gianfrancesco shares how to make delicious Italian staples.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen showcases how easy it is to incorporate Japanese flavours into everyday meals.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencers "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: In this bacon loving episode, Chef Spencer delivers a tasty Bacon Weave Turkey Breast, which gets injected with beer and spices before being wrapped up in its cozy bacon blanket and sent off to the grill! Next up? A Peameal Bacon Roast with Rosti. This heavy hunk of back bacon gets smoked to flavourful perfection while Chef Watts makes the crispiest golden-fried-to-perfection potato pancake. Then, Spencer whips up a charry, grilled, super decadent, bacon-wrapped and bacon stuffed cheeseburger. Spencer isnt finished with bacon yet! For his final recipe, Spencer stuffs an apple with decadent crispy morsels stuffed along with savoury caramelized onions and melty cheddar cheese.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: This episode kicks off with Spencers tasty Grilled Caesar Salad. He skillfully piles of char-grilled romaine lettuce wedges and sourdough croutons are topped with tangy dressing, crispy pancetta, and shards of a homemade parmesan tuile. For his next recipe, Spencer whips up Grilled Zucchini Boats that filled with fresh ingredients including orzo pasta, summer veggies, and herbs. Chef Watts loves a good steak and his Grilled Cauliflower Steak is not one to be passed up! Dusted in Middle Eastern Spices, flame roasted and served with chili-spiked, Yemeni Skhug hot sauce and pomegranate seeds. Finally, Spencer steams tender artichokes, stuffing these flowers with breadcrumbs and...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-masters social feed is meat on a stick - and Chef Spencers Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative Tornado Potato which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: "A" is on the menu and Chef Robert Jewell takes on this meal challenge with apricots and avocados. First up, Robert cooks a spicy roasted quail and drizzles it with some sweet apricot and calvados sauce. Next, is a meal best served cold! Robert slices up sushi-grade tuna and transforms it into a flavourful tartare, brought to life by rich avocado and refreshing lime. On the side, he adds crusty crostini with savoury soy sauce and sesame oil, the perfect complement for this meltin- your-mouth meal. For his final dish, Robert combines apricots and avocados for an unbelievably tasty dish.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Host Theresa Visintin picks the letter “D” in this challenge and combines two very different ingredients – dill and duck! But that’s no big dill for Theresa. For her first dish, Theresa uses dill seeds and weed to make a hearty, creamy dill pickle soup. She adds chicken broth and potatoes as her base but makes the soup extra smooth with some sour cream. She tops the soup with dill pickles to add a delightful crunch. Next, Theresa takes duck, a classic French ingredient, and gives it a French Canadian twist – duck tourtière. Using the duck fat to fry up some veggies, she adds red wine to her chicken stock and simmers the meat. Then, Theresa fills a pie crust with this delightful duck...

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Showcasing the unique flavours of endive and eggplant, Chef Lauren Gulyas receives the letter "E" for her cooking challenge. She sets sail by creating an endive salad boat, the perfect delivery vessel for her smoked trout with creÌ€me fraiche, and goat cheese with walnut appetizers. She follows up with a stuffed baby eggplant, Moroccan style! Chef Lauren sauteÌs onion and garlic with some smoky sweet paprika and a snip of savoury sage, the aromatic combination lends itself beautifully to the succulent flavour of lamb. For her grand finale, Chef Lauren prepares the pieÌ€ce de reÌsistance using both endive and eggplant.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Its all about the letter "S" as Chef Robert Jewell cooks up tasty meals using shrimp and sausage. For his first recipe, Robert fries up turmeric-spiced sweet potato fritters with a shrimp centre. He takes this tantalizing appetizer to another level with a savoury lime soy dipping sauce. Next up, Robert makes an English breakfast strata. This sausage casserole is easily the BEST way to start your day. He layers the bottom of the dish with buttered sourdough slices, before adding crispy fried sausages, leeks and tomatoes. He then covers it in a creamy egg mixture, crumbles stilton on top and bakes it to golden brown. Finally, Robert combines shrimp and sausage into one flavourful dish.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Chris Souster is an Attorney by day and a boxing coach by night. He sees the similarities between disputes in the courtroom and fighting in the ring. Today we get a perspective on what his coaching day looks like and the knowledge he shares with his MMA fighters.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athletes success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Josh Hopkins as we delve into the life of a coach.

Takana on ura MI6:n agenttina, jonka han jatti Kiovassa sattuneen katastrofin takia. Mutta menneisyydellahan on taipumusta loytya edesta hanen ammatissaan. Kun Baxter saa tilaisuuden selvittaa, mita Kiovassa tuona kohtalokkaana iltana tapahtui, han tarttuu siihen.

programme.title: Shes The Man
programme.desc: Viola Hastings (Amanda Bynes) kuulee kauhukseen, etta tyttojen futisjoukkue lopetetaan. Kun portti poikien joukkueeseen ei muuten aukea, Viola paattaa esiintya veljenaan Sebastianina, jonka oleskelu Lontoossa venahtaa. Mutta pojan rooli ei olekaan ihan helppo vetaa, etenkaan kun kamppiksena on sopo Duke (Channing Tatum), joka tosin on ihastunut kauniiseen Oliviaan (Laura Ramsey), joka puolestaan ihastuu herkkaan uuteen poikaan Sebastianiin... Elokuva perustuu kevytjuustoakin loysemmin Shakespearen Loppiaisaattoon.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

programme.title: Kauas pilvet karkaavat
programme.desc: Kauas pilvet karkaavat kertoo helsinkilaispariskunnasta. Raitiovaununkuljettaja ja perinteikkaan ravintola Dubrovnikin hovimestari menettavat tyonsa, mutta eivat toivoaan Aki Kaurismaen (Le Havre) Suomi-trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa.

programme.title: A Little Bit Of Heaven
programme.desc: Kate Hudson on taydellinen roolissaan sateilevan kauniina Marleyna, nuorena uranaisena, joka sairastuu yllattaen syopaan. Marley on oikea flirttailija, joka ei ole koskaan ollut rakastunut, mutta kun laakarin roolissa on vastustamaton Gael García Bernal, olisiko rakkaus kuitenkin laakkeista paras?

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Maggie (Anne Hathaway) kohtaa Viagraa kauppaavan Jamien (Jake Gyllenhaal). Heidan kemiansa petihommissa toimii, joten he paattavat aloittaa suhteen – ilman sitoumuksia. Mutta Maggien ja Jamien ottaa valtaansa huumeista vaarallisin – rakkaus!

programme.title: The Big Short
programme.desc: Kun nelja ulkopuolista naki sen, minka isot pankit, media ja valtionhallinto kielsivat - maailmantalouden romahtamisen - he saivat ajatuksen isosta shorttauksesta. Rohkea sijoittaminen johtaa heidat pankkialan pimealle puolelle, jossa kaikki on kyseenalaistettava. Adam Mckayn (Anchorman, Step Brothers) ohjaama elokuva perustuu tositarinaan ja Michael Lewisin menestyskirjaan (The Blind Side, Moneyball). Elokuvaa tahdittavat Christian Bale, Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling ja Brad Pitt.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.

programme.title: My Week With Marilyn
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen viikosta Englannissa, jossa han oli kuvaamassa elokuvaa "Prinssi ja revyytytto" hurmaten kaikki niin kameran edessa kuin takanakin. Colin Clarkin kahteen kirjaan perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen ja Laurence Olivierin tahdittaman elokuvan Prinssi ja revyytytto (1957) synnysta. Tarina keskittyy viikkoon, jolloin Clark toimi Marilyn Monroen isantana Englannissa taman miehen Arthur Millerin poistuttua maasta.

programme.title: Puhdistaja (Walking Tall)
programme.desc: Kun on kyse lain noudattamisesta, yksi mies voi tehda eron! Toimintatahti Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson ei ota vankeja taistellessaan oikeuden puolesta ja murskatessaan korruptiota tassa tarinassa miehesta, joka ottaa kantaa… ja ottaa kaupunkinsa takaisin!

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: Lorenzo Anello on amerikanitalialainen bussikuski Bronxin esikaupungissa New Yorkissa. Hanella on vaimo Rosina ja poika Calogero. Eraana paivana Calogero joutuu silminnakijaksi murhaan kotitalonsa edessa.

Mika alkaa tavallisena tyopaivana, muuttuu nopeasti henkea uhkaavaksi taisteluksi pehmealuonteiselle amerikkalaiselle kopilotille, kun joukko terroristeja yrittaa ottaa hallintaansa hanen Pariisiin suuntautuvan lentonsa. Nyt hanen on taisteltava – ei vain oman henkensa puolesta, vaan myos matkustajien ja miehiston – yrittamalla muodostaa ainutlaatuinen yhteys yhteen kaappaajista. Omid Memar on myos mukana.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: A Little Bit Of Heaven
programme.desc: Kate Hudson on taydellinen roolissaan sateilevan kauniina Marleyna, nuorena uranaisena, joka sairastuu yllattaen syopaan. Marley on oikea flirttailija, joka ei ole koskaan ollut rakastunut, mutta kun laakarin roolissa on vastustamaton Gael García Bernal, olisiko rakkaus kuitenkin laakkeista paras?

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: Im Not There
programme.desc: MIES. MUSIIKKI. LEGENDA. Nae Heath Ledgerin ja muiden tahtien loistavat roolisuoritukset. Im Not There on epatavallinen matka halki Bob Dylanin elaman. Kuusi eri nayttelijaa esittaa Dylania eri aikakausilla ja eri rooleissa julkisuuden henkilosta yksityiseen. Lopputuloksena on varikas muotokuva tasta julkisuutta karttelevasta amerikkalaisikonista. Runoilija, profeetta, lainsuojaton, teeskentelija, valovoimainen tahti, rocknroll -marttyyri, uskovainen - seitseman identiteettia, yksi elama, yhta lavea ja hurja kuin ajanjakso, jonka moottori se oli.

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: Valtava asteroidi lahestyy Maata, ja viimeinen keino sen pysayttamiseksi on juuri epaonnistunut. Ihmiset reagoivat 21 paivan paasta koittavaan maailmanloppuun varsin kirjavilla teoilla. Vakuutusmyyja Dodgen ja naapurintytto Pennyn tiet kohtaavat mellakoiden yltyessa ja he paattavat auttaa toisiaan matkalla kohti viimeisia paamaariaan.

programme.title: My Week With Marilyn
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen viikosta Englannissa, jossa han oli kuvaamassa elokuvaa "Prinssi ja revyytytto" hurmaten kaikki niin kameran edessa kuin takanakin. Colin Clarkin kahteen kirjaan perustuva brittidraama kertoo Marilyn Monroen ja Laurence Olivierin tahdittaman elokuvan Prinssi ja revyytytto (1957) synnysta. Tarina keskittyy viikkoon, jolloin Clark toimi Marilyn Monroen isantana Englannissa taman miehen Arthur Millerin poistuttua maasta.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.

programme.title: What Maisie Knew
programme.desc: Isan lyottaytyessa sopimattomasti yhteen Maisien lastenhoitajan kanssa ja aidin loytaessa vierelleen nuoren baarimikon Lincolnin, kasvavat eroriidan panokset entisestaan, ja viattoman Maisie-paran sukkulointi kotien valilla saa yha sydamettomampia piirteita. Maisie pitaa kuitenkin silmansa valppaasti apposen auki ja nakee tarkasti sokean itsekkyyden lavitse. Maisie tietaa, etta hanen on itse raivattava tiensa kotiin aikuisten lapsellisuuden suosta.

programme.title: Youre Not You
programme.desc: Kaksinkertainen Oscar-voittaja Hillary Swank on menestynyt konserttipianisti Kate, jossa todetaan parantumaton sairaus ALS. Hanen perheensa jarjestaa hanelle parasta mahdollista hoitoa, mutta Kate itse antautuu taysin epapatevan Becin hoiviin. Hoitoon sisaltyy yhta lailla naurua kuin kyyneleitakin, ja nama kaksi taysin erilaista naista loytavat toistensa suurimmat vahvuudet.

programme.title: Childs Play (2019)
programme.desc: ”SE”-elokuvan tuottajien CHILD’S PLAY on taysin uusi versio pahasta Chucky-nukesta kertovasta kauhuklassikosta. Chuckyn aanena kuullaan Mark Hamill. Kun Karen ostaa huippukehittyneen Buddi-nuken syntymapaivalahjaksi pojalleen Andylle, han kutsuu tietamattaan pahuuden kotiinsa. Andyn taytyy saada aikuiset kuuntelemaan, jotta nukke saadaan pysaytettya ennen kuin on liian myohaista.

programme.title: Tristan and Isolde
programme.desc: Sodan erottamat Tristan ja Isolde joutuvat pitamaan tunteensa kurissa rauhan ja Englannin tulevaisuuden takia. Mutta mita enemman he kieltavat tunteensa, sita vahvempina ne vellovat....

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: Lorenzo Anello on amerikanitalialainen bussikuski Bronxin esikaupungissa New Yorkissa. Hanella on vaimo Rosina ja poika Calogero. Eraana paivana Calogero joutuu silminnakijaksi murhaan kotitalonsa edessa.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.desc: Two forest workers are attacked by a grizzly bear, leaving one of the men scalped.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine trouble plagues Buffalos newest Electra, ZFE, and a standoff between Joe and Transport Canada threatens to close the airline. At the same time, Joe faces a tough decision about his old dog Sophie.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikeys much-planned D-Day tribute parachute jump with 20 paratroopers hits a wall when Joe refuses to fly his DC-3 to the drop zone.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: C-46 and DC-4 crews race against the spring melt to fly mining equipment to an airstrip on a frozen lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As Joe fights a Transport Canada claim against the airline, star pilot Justin is tasked with shipping an 8,000lb generator to a remote town.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey goes on a treasure hunt to Venezuela for a rare CL-215 waterbomber.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Crusty mechanic Chuck leads the scramble to ready the Electra for a disaster relief mission in Haiti, but fates curveball sends them to the High Arctic instead.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when theyre asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage in Yellowknife, new manager Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe receives a negative visit from Transport Canada when inspectors threaten to shut down the airline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory are stranded in Croatia while trying to complete the delivery of two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra returns from repairs and the crew takes it right back to the ice strip that it set off from before the crash landing last year. Tyler works up the courage to confront Joe about a big decision. A hotshot Australian pilot tries to earn a job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Facing Joes wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. Its Joes 69th birthday - and hes never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Co-pilot Graemes fumbles his Electra training landings. Chris stresses over his C-46 check ride. Adam rescues a stranded C-46.

programme.title: Lake Titicaca, Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Lake Titicaca, Peru"
programme.desc: The brothers hitch-hike from the ancient Inca capitol of Cuzco, down the spine of the Andes Mountains to Lake Titicaca. They suffer acute mountain sickness, get high on coca leaves and meet some locals as they battle their way across the Andes.

programme.title: FISHING IS NOT FAIR
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bottom Feeders S1 - "FISHING IS NOT FAIR"
programme.desc: The desire and competition for catching fish is at an all time high but fishing is anything but fair.

programme.title: STORM IS BREWING
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Bottom Feeders S1 - "STORM IS BREWING"
programme.desc: A distant natural disaster creates uncertainty for all commercial fishing crews in the upper Midwest. Jedd finds a valuable species in his haul but isn’t sure a market exists. Tim races against shifting conditions in hopes of scoring a decent haul.

programme.title: Their Adventure Begins
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Roads End S1 - "Their Adventure Begins"
programme.desc: Two adrenaline junkies that love nothing more than off road adventure motor biking. And they’re off on their most epic journey ever, to Argentina.

programme.title: Broken Bike
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Roads End S1 - "Broken Bike"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave are pushed to their limits. Fighting through the rough ride across the scorching sand dunes littered with shrubbery Rob is unable to continue.

programme.title: Bay of Islands Exploration
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Bay of Islands Exploration"
programme.desc: The fellas set off to tick a box for rookie spearo Ants, aiming to bag him his first ever kingfish, before shifting focus to landing a few more prized fish in some stunning Bay of Islands blue water, but as it doesnt all go according to plan!

programme.title: South Minerva Reef
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 South Seas Spearo S2 - "South Minerva Reef"
programme.desc: The team embark on their biggest mission to date, an expedition to the remote and revered Minerva Reefs, where they encounter the most incredible diving conditions theyve ever experienced, but also, a thriving population of voracious sharks!

programme.title: Creations of Prins Albert
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Creations of Prins Albert"
programme.desc: Despite unforeseen travel complications, Xander travels through a picturesque mountain pass to Prince Albert to enjoy the olive farms and other specialties the town has to offer.

programme.title: The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Ghosts of Matjiesfontein"
programme.desc: With one final trip ahead of them, Xander and his crew make their way from the scorching desert of Lindbergh to the haunted ghost town of Matjiesfontein.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: The real Madagascar has no talking lions, zebras or hippos. What it does have is the most unique collection of plants and animals anywhere on earth. Bill fights the nearly inaccessible land to find a rare lemur that dances and another one that sings.

programme.title: Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

programme.title: Thailand: US Thai Food vs Authentic-Thai, which is the winner?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Thailand: US Thai Food vs Authentic-Thai, which is the winner?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

programme.title: Finland
programme.desc: Finland is that one Nordic country that is never on the global cuisine radar. However, the reserved Finns have been quietly perfecting their craft of foraging culture and incorporating it into their unique cuisine. Jonathan Legg explores the entire expanse of the country to understand it’s cuisine, and the ethos of the country’s top chefs; from amazing locally sourced cuisine in Helsinki, to an expedition in Lapland to learn about foraging and the Finnish delicacy, reindeer!

programme.title: Ireland
programme.desc: It’s the birthplace of Halloween, but the ghosts and ghouls which have canvassed the world have not scared up much interest in Irish cuisine. Mounting a classic motorcycle Jonathan tours a land of mystic traditions, boisterous locals, and iconic scenery. The world’s most magnetic pub culture draws him in, border conflict pushes him out, and dark legends pull him around. It’s an adventure soaked in rain, lore, and the food of ancestor’s past.

programme.title: India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Maximum Foodie S1 - "India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?"
programme.desc: Liesel pinballs around a city known for its gastronomy, the forgotten hub of British East India trading company, Kolkata. From trying out what the bustling city’s vibrant street food scene has to offer, to the lesser known gems, including, venturing into India’s only Chinatown and sampling their delicacies. A tale of walking food tours, hole in the wall joints serving up North Eastern dumplings, messy fish markets, and of course, the pride of Bengal, the Hilsa fish. Is Kolkata up to par with the other major metropolitan cities of India? This episode finds out exactly that!

programme.title: Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?"
programme.desc: This investigative mission starts off in the sin city atmosphere of the Vegas strip. After a gluttonous stint at a generic buffet, Liesel is inspired to do a road trip to find iconic gems in the state of Nevada. From ghost towns, to monstrous foodie challenges, to hole in the wall dive bars in the middle of nowhere, this trip has it all. Liesel finds the resurgence of Basque cuisine in Northern Nevada, and learns that Reno can do fine dining as well! A trip to Virginia city also reveals that the Silver State has some haunted bars where patrons from the 1800s are rumored to be still imbibing and spooking locals! It’s a road trip in every sense of the word!

programme.title: Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Fight to Survive S2 - "Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 1"
programme.desc: Hunters Adrian Knopps and Garrett Hagen venture into the remotest part of Alaska’s Misty Fjord, hunting Moose and Bear. After a successful hunt Adrian finds himself trapped by a twenty foot tidal surge after Garrett fails to return with the skiff.

programme.title: Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Fight to Survive S2 - "Stranded In The Alaska Wild - Part 2"
programme.desc: After a successful hunt, Adrian Knopps’ hunting partner disappears taking their bear out to the boat. Now Adrian finds himself stranded on a tidal flat surround by bears and wolf packs and with massive storm bearing down on him. How will he survive?

programme.title: The Journal
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Fight to Survive S2 - "The Journal"
programme.desc: Pastor Mike Turner is on a solo hike across the continental divide in the unforgiving Wind Rivers Range of Wyoming, when he becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder. He chronicles his grueling 11 day fight to survive in his own journal.

programme.title: Terrys Reindeer Game
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S2 - "Terrys Reindeer Game"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry test a scene from Reindeer Games when Ben Affleck and Charlize Theron get trapped under a frozen lake, and they escape by shooting 3 shots with a 12-gauge shot gun underwater to blast a hole in the ice to escape.

programme.title: Ex-Men The Origins of Terry
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S2 - "Ex-Men The Origins of Terry"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry test a famous scene from X-men. They are attempting to see if you can split a bullet with a Katana sword

programme.title: Pay Terry Back
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S2 - "Pay Terry Back"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry test 2 scenes from Mel Gibson’s film Payback. Mels character is in the back of a taxi when 4 bad guys pull up next to him in an SUV, they open fire and Mel uses a bad guy in the cab as a shield.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: The Road Runner is In-Violet, Dougie is Plum Crazy.
programme.sub-title: S16 : E07 Graveyard Carz S16 - "The Road Runner is In-Violet, Dougie is Plum Crazy."
programme.desc: Road Runners are overrunning the shop! Will continues to train his son Brody as the Graveyard’s newest painter.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.sub-title: S16 : E08 Graveyard Carz S16 - "Family Ties"
programme.desc: Two 1969 Hemi Charger R/T 4-speed cars arrive at the shop, one still runs, so Mark and Doug go for a spin!

programme.title: A-Body in the Graveyard
programme.sub-title: S16 : E09 Graveyard Carz S16 - "A-Body in the Graveyard"
programme.desc: Rarely seen among Mopar muscle, the Chrysler A-Bodies have some die-hard fans!

programme.title: Philippines
programme.desc: The nation of 7,000 islands has no problems with beach, sun, or sea; but they suffer tremendously with cuisine image. Jonathan lands in Manila to discover the top chefs are well aware of the issue and, following their advice, he launches off on an expedition to find part of the solution. Driving from headhunting tribal villages, to step-back-in-time colonial towns, to restaurants in the shadow of the American military behemoth an intriguing story slowly pieces together. In the dense jungle one treasure stays buried while another comes literally out of the woodwork. But danger always lurks.. zombie moray eels, landslide prone passes, and forbidden fields behind the rice paddies.

programme.title: Finland
programme.desc: Finland is that one Nordic country that is never on the global cuisine radar. However, the reserved Finns have been quietly perfecting their craft of foraging culture and incorporating it into their unique cuisine. Jonathan Legg explores the entire expanse of the country to understand it’s cuisine, and the ethos of the country’s top chefs; from amazing locally sourced cuisine in Helsinki, to an expedition in Lapland to learn about foraging and the Finnish delicacy, reindeer!
