A trip to Virginia city also reveals that the Silver State has some haunted bars where patrons from the 1800s are rumored to be still imbibing and spooking locals! It’s a road trip in every sense of the word!

programme.title: The Bullet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Bullet"
programme.desc: Today’s couples are Kevin and Patrycja from Norway and Nitzan and Nadav from Israel. Who will win todays game?

programme.title: The Torch
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Torch"
programme.desc: Today’s couples are Michael and Nina from Australia and Floris and Emile from Latvia. Which of these couples will escape the castle first?

programme.title: The Doll
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Dracula: Escape the Castle S1 - "The Doll"
programme.desc: Today’s teams are Mark from The USA and Elina from Finland against Sarah and Sebastien from Paris in France. Who will escape the castle?

programme.title: Stolen Future
programme.desc: Montana Game Wardens have their hands full with headless deer, trophy bull elk being poached and illegally tagged deer. But the Future of hunting is bright with a new batch of hunters.

programme.title: Night Chase
programme.desc: With a massive Winter storm bearing down on Northern Montana Wardens arent backing off. Wardens catch one guy in a web of lies at a check station while miles away they chase down a decoy shooter that refuses to give up.

programme.title: Wasted Dummy
programme.desc: This week Warden Lesofski searches out a hunting party that left their elk to rot. While Region 2 Wardens rush into a volatile situation after their decoy is shot from the road.

programme.title: The Intrusion of Strangers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Living Stone S1 - "The Intrusion of Strangers"
programme.desc: The introduction of Kieren and Nina is a jaw dropper for all the others, especially for Teresa who is the first one that has to deal with them in exile.

programme.title: Down to the Wire
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Living Stone S1 - "Down to the Wire"
programme.desc: The couples move deeper into the beautiful Okavango Delta with empty stomachs, their minds determined to survive and their camp surrounded by wildlife.

programme.title: The Gift of Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Love"
programme.desc: With a tank full of gas donated by a “would-be traveler”, Leon and Kindness One® leave LA and try their luck in Sin City before finding help from a Scotsman in an out of the way Western town in Colorado, inspires his first surprise gift.

programme.title: The Gift of Security
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Security"
programme.desc: Leon goes deep into working life on a cattle ranch in Nebraska – literally. Has bike trouble in Chicago, before being shunned by the Amish, but a chance encounter with a homeless man in Pittsburgh, leaves him transformed and inspires his next gift.

programme.title: Man Eating Crocs
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Man Eating Crocs"
programme.desc: Mario risks it all by rafting down the deadliest strip of water in Africa, the Zambezi River, towards lake Kariba, only to find himself in front of some of the biggest and baddest problematic man-eating crocodiles on the planet.

programme.title: Namibian Desert Onyx
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Man Eats Wild S2 - "Namibian Desert Onyx"
programme.desc: Mario was told by locals that deep in the Namibian desert there is an odd-looking creature that is great nutritional value that has been harvested by people for hundreds of years.

programme.title: Running
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Photonis Ultimate Forces Challenge S1 - "Running"
programme.desc: Our teams have to work as an individual, as well as a team. All teams can still make it to the semi-finales. Some of the teams need a win more then others.

programme.title: Water Challenge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Photonis Ultimate Forces Challenge S1 - "Water Challenge"
programme.desc: Today the 5 teams left in the competition will have to do a water challenge. Not every individual team member is comfortable with water assignments.

programme.title: Paris and Barcelona
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "Paris and Barcelona"
programme.desc: Bones introduce his trademark trickery to people in Paris and Barcelona, performing mind reading and an attempt to escape a straitjacket while breakdancing.

programme.title: Luxor, Egypt
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Luxor, Egypt"
programme.desc: The brothers chosen form of transport in Egypt is a Felucca Boat…the ancient trading vessel of transport. They travel north along the Nile, from the oasis town of Aswan to the ancient city of Luxor, before finding a massive sand dune to slide down.

programme.title: Abisko, Swedish Lapland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Abisko, Swedish Lapland"
programme.desc: Lapland is a frozen, winterland of reindeer, Sami people and saunas. The brothers start in Stockholm and fly 200 kilometers straight north above the Arctic Circle. Their chosen mode of transport for this journey is a reindeer sleigh.

programme.title: Donsol, Philippines
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Donsol, Philippines"
programme.desc: Disaster and triumph set this show apart. The brothers start out with a near death boat disaster in the southern Philippine Sea but bounce back and end up attaining their goal of reaching Donsol village, the whale shark capitol of the world.

programme.title: The Swamp
programme.desc: Trusting Vitor was difficult, so the red team sent him away. Blue team fights back, without soldier Keith. No closed doors this time but mud, insect and reed.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.desc: Ibiza’s medical services face heavy strain during tourist season, often due to late-night excesses. In Thailand, nurses work tirelessly at the Full Moon Party to keep international revelers safe.

programme.title: RIVER POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Police Patrol S1 - "RIVER POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: In Brazil, the Paraná River is a major trafficking route—patrolled by NEPOM, a specialized river police unit. In Guayaquil, Ecuador, police join forces with local communities to combat all forms of trafficking on the ground.

programme.title: North Minerva Reef
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 South Seas Spearo S2 - "North Minerva Reef"
programme.desc: After punching their way to North Minerva, the fellas continue their quest to land a big pelagic, but the local toothies threaten to throw a spanner into the team’s plans. Can they bag a tropical trophy, or will the sharks rain on their parade?

programme.title: Yellowfin Mission
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Yellowfin Mission"
programme.desc: Words gotten out about some massive yellowfin baitballs, so the team head out in search of more tuna glory. Dwane, Kieran, Sam and Dave then bounce over the ditch for a few days diving the stunning waters of the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Lucinda Sky with Diamonds
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Lucinda Sky with Diamonds"
programme.desc: The lads try their luck at getting a spear into one of the quintessential Australian fish species - the barramundi. Problem is, these barra inhabit the same waters as a couple of other less welcome locals - saltwater crocodiles and bull sharks!

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Chasing the Sun S2 - "Hong Kong"
programme.desc: Whether street art and tofu or Bruce Lee and the Star Ferry, Hong Kong is a City overflowing with art and history. Stephen learns about the secrets from the locals and the expats.

programme.title: Vietnam
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Chasing the Sun S2 - "Vietnam"
programme.desc: Stephen Immerses himself in the local culture, learning about generations worth of traditions from barber shops and mask making.

programme.title: Bali
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Chasing the Sun S2 - "Bali"
programme.desc: Island of the gods. With Bali’s ecological majesty as our backdrop, we find people working hard to make a difference in their community and coming together to save the planet.

programme.title: Ho Chi Minh City
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Epic Exploring S2 - "Ho Chi Minh City"
programme.desc: Cody Buffinton steps into the streets of bustling Ho Chi Minh city in Vietnam in search of some hidden gems and urban exploring treasures.

programme.title: Stripped
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Stripped"
programme.desc: Meet Nigel McNally and the team from Kestrel Beer who has hopes of breaking the land speed record in a restored 1930’a Riley Kestrel 9.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.desc: Ibiza’s medical services face heavy strain during tourist season, often due to late-night excesses. In Thailand, nurses work tirelessly at the Full Moon Party to keep international revelers safe.

programme.title: RIVER POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Police Patrol S1 - "RIVER POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: In Brazil, the Paraná River is a major trafficking route—patrolled by NEPOM, a specialized river police unit. In Guayaquil, Ecuador, police join forces with local communities to combat all forms of trafficking on the ground.

programme.title: Paint Your Red River Stagecoach at High Noon
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S2 - "Paint Your Red River Stagecoach at High Noon"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry will test different famous shots from westerns. Can you shoot a cowboy hat off the bad guy? Will a shotgun blast really throw you back through a window? Can a single shot from a colt revolver break shackles?

programme.title: Terrys Underworld
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S2 - "Terrys Underworld"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry are going to test a famous scene from Underworld with Kate Beckensale. Terry will attempt to shoot a circle around himself in the floor and fall through to save himself from the pack of werewolves.

programme.title: A Pirates Life for Terry
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S3 - "A Pirates Life for Terry"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry go on a swashbuckling adventure when they test two scenes from the 1920’s film, The Black Pirate starring Douglas Fairbanks, Senior. Terry will see if he can knock down a ships mast with a canon, and then test gravity as he slides down a sail with only a knife.

programme.title: Trey-Magnifique
programme.desc: The 1971 Road Runner 440-6BBL 4-speed is in assembly, and ready for its drivetrain!

programme.title: 3 Amigos, 2 Road Runners, 1 Sunroof
programme.sub-title: S16 : E11 Graveyard Carz S16 - "3 Amigos, 2 Road Runners, 1 Sunroof"
programme.desc: Three pilots pals, want three custom built Mopars–but they want them all done at the same time!

programme.title: Volvo P1800
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Volvo P1800"
programme.desc: Mat Watson hunts throughout Europe for a classy Nordic coupe. The Volvo P1800.

programme.title: Fiat 500
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Fiat 500"
programme.desc: Mat Watson is asked to track down a Fiat 500 for a client with a tiny garage, but finding a good example of this little motor proves a massive challenge.

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "New York"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie hits New York City in a four million dollar rare Lamborghini Centenario. Her quest is to track down the players in the underground drift driving scene and visit the exclusive Manhattan Motor Club.

programme.title: Papua New Guinea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel Quest S1 - "Papua New Guinea"
programme.desc: There is no place on earth with such diverse cultures has Papua New Guinea. Bill follows the trail of the legendary headhunters deep into the rainforest only to uncover secrets even more mysterious.

programme.title: South Korea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Quest S1 - "South Korea"
programme.desc: Follow Bill as he tours a medieval aristocrats massive fortress that mirrors the Forbidden City. From giant burial mounds, to new Olympic sites, to still moving food, join Bill as he finds the soul of this modern ancient country.

programme.title: GOA and SINGAPORE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Travel in Style S1 - "GOA and SINGAPORE"
programme.desc: In Goa, the team look at the incredible wildlife and beaches of this former Portuguese Colony. Staying in Asia our team discover the presidential suite in Fullerton – Singapore.

programme.title: BRAZIL and SWEDEN
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Travel in Style S1 - "BRAZIL and SWEDEN"
programme.desc: In this episode our lucky crew stay in perhaps one of the most famous hotels on the planet – Copacabana Palace. In Sweden we stay in a really cool hotel that’s only just been built!

programme.title: China
programme.desc: The canals of Suzhou make you feel you are part of a fairytale, but the classical gardens make you feel like an elite scholar! Ashley explores China for the first time and becomes part of the traditional Chinese opera.

programme.title: Chiang Mai V Venice
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Jet Set S1 - "Chiang Mai V Venice"
programme.desc: Richard immerses himself in Thai culture, picking his own rice, learning to cook Thai style with a local top chef and paying a visit to a retired elephant park. While Gill heads to the Italian city of Venice, for a cheeky Bellini in Harry’s Bar.

programme.title: Eze (France) V Stockholm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Jet Set S1 - "Eze (France) V Stockholm"
programme.desc: From the French Riviera, Richard attempts to win the episode from his hotel, where every house in the town is actually a hotel suite. Meanwhile Gill tours the Swedish capital of Stockholm, sailing around the archipelago.

programme.title: The Panorama
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Panorama"
programme.desc: On opposite sides of the world, Adam and a member of the South African crew each attempt to conquer their fears.

programme.title: Into the Bush
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Into the Bush"
programme.desc: As Xander and his crew travel into the bush, they discover South Africa’s most beautiful qualities: national parks, safaris, and magnificent wildlife.

programme.title: Great Walls of Beijing
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Foodwise S2 - "Great Walls of Beijing"
programme.desc: From feasts of tofu made using well-water and fish caught fresh from the reservoir, to bubbling cauldrons of thinly-sliced lamb, the hilly suburbs of Beijing are home to some of the best-loved weekend escapes, and theyre all by the Great Wall.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Streets S1 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Los Angeles based electronic music producer and DJ Moe Espinosa, aka Drumcell, has created sonic soundscapes which tell cinematic stories with his music. Moe has always tried to avoid commercialism and by having a vision that remains independent.

programme.title: Matthieu Dupuis Baumal – Chateau de la Gaude
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Taste of France S1 - "Matthieu Dupuis Baumal – Chateau de la Gaude"
programme.desc: In this program we’ll explore the story of the skilled Chef Matthieu Dupuis Baumal, his style of cooking and how he took his team to greatness in only a couple of months! We’ll also visit one of the best olive oil producers in the world.

programme.title: Amandine Chaignot – Pouliche
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Taste of France S1 - "Amandine Chaignot – Pouliche"
programme.desc: In this program Amandine Chaignot demonstrates the extent of her talent, serving refined vegetarian-focused cuisine. We’ll get to know her secrets for stimulating flavors and the principles behind her raw, refined French cuisine.

programme.title: Antonin Bonnet – Quinsou
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Taste of France S1 - "Antonin Bonnet – Quinsou"
programme.desc: In this program we’ll get an insight of the importance of quality, as Antonin sources his ingredients with diligence. Making careful use of all elements, his kitchen manages to match sustainability with elegance and excellence.

programme.title: Nose to Tail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Order Up! S1 - "Nose to Tail"
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, Hudson explores Nose to Tail dining where he learns to cook every part of an animal from bird to goat, facing lots of obstacles along the way. This sustainable way of cooking is definitely not for the squeamish, but it’s worth it.

programme.title: Using Your Noodle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Order Up! S1 - "Using Your Noodle"
programme.desc: Hudson goes to Singapore to learn everything he needs to know about noodle-making and Asian ingredients, taking a dive into the cultural staple while facing challenges in prepping and cooking noodles, including recreating a dish from taste alone.

programme.title: Whats the Secret Sauce?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Order Up! S1 - "Whats the Secret Sauce?"
programme.desc: Singaporeans are crazy about their curry and that’s why Hudson wants to find out everything about the different spices and ingredients that constitute an authentic Indian curry, and the elevated renditions of curries from burgers to curry fish heads.

programme.title: Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

programme.title: Thailand: US Thai Food vs Authentic-Thai, which is the winner?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Thailand: US Thai Food vs Authentic-Thai, which is the winner?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

programme.title: India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Maximum Foodie S1 - "India: Can Kolkata be considered a foodie destination of India?"
programme.desc: Liesel pinballs around a city known for its gastronomy, the forgotten hub of British East India trading company, Kolkata. From trying out what the bustling city’s vibrant street food scene has to offer, to the lesser known gems, including, venturing into India’s only Chinatown and sampling their delicacies. A tale of walking food tours, hole in the wall joints serving up North Eastern dumplings, messy fish markets, and of course, the pride of Bengal, the Hilsa fish. Is Kolkata up to par with the other major metropolitan cities of India? This episode finds out exactly that!

programme.title: How to Order Chinese Food
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Foodwise S2 - "How to Order Chinese Food"
programme.desc: In this episode, hosts Tianran and Eva will give you a crash course on everything from choosing the right restaurant, to pairing dishes according to color, aroma, taste and form, so that at the end, you too can feast your friends like a pro.

programme.title: Eat Like Confucius
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Foodwise S2 - "Eat Like Confucius"
programme.desc: "Foodwise" host Tianran He explores the ancient town of Qufu, the birthplace of Confucius.

programme.title: The Herbal Way of Life
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Foodwise S2 - "The Herbal Way of Life"
programme.desc: In this Foodwise episode, our hosts Tianran He and Eva May explore this ancient concept of medicine food homology as they taste their way through different herbs.

programme.title: Clement Bouvier – Ursus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Taste of France S1 - "Clement Bouvier – Ursus"
programme.desc: In his quest to amaze his guests, Clement aims to always surprise, always exceed their expectations. By bringing the very forest to the table, both in his cuisine and in architecture, his visitors are in for a special and unique treat.

programme.title: As Fresh As It Gets
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Order Up! S1 - "As Fresh As It Gets"
programme.desc: From floating fish farms to plucking fresh greens from a garden, Hudson continues his culinary journey through Signapore and finds out how local ingredients make their way from farm to table. Even facing an unexpected reptilian ingredient…

programme.title: The Ultimate Test
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Order Up! S1 - "The Ultimate Test"
programme.desc: In his final days in Singapore, Hudson explores modern interpretations of traditional recipes, then creates a menu for the US Ambassador and learns from a Michelin-starred chef. His journey ends when he cooks for local celebrities, and own VIP guest.

programme.title: Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Nevada: What else is there in Nevada for foodies besides Vegas?"
programme.desc: This investigative mission starts off in the sin city atmosphere of the Vegas strip. After a gluttonous stint at a generic buffet, Liesel is inspired to do a road trip to find iconic gems in the state of Nevada. From ghost towns, to monstrous foodie challenges, to hole in the wall dive bars in the middle of nowhere, this trip has it all. Liesel finds the resurgence of Basque cuisine in Northern Nevada, and learns that Reno can do fine dining as well! A trip to Virginia city also reveals that the Silver State has some haunted bars where patrons from the 1800s are rumored to be still imbibing and spooking locals! It’s a road trip in every sense of the word!

programme.title: Rome: What are the tourists missing out on?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Rome: What are the tourists missing out on?"
programme.desc: Italy is a vacationer’s paradise. The food, the people, the sights and sounds, the history! But are the tourists doing it right when it comes to the trying out authentic food in Rome? Liesel embarks on a mission to explore the street food of the city. With the help of her food journalist buddy, Saverio de Luca, Liesel sifts through pasticceri, food festivals, touristed hotspots, all in an effort to understand real Roman food.

programme.title: Emlia Romagna: What’s the food like?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Emlia Romagna: What’s the food like?"
programme.desc: The region of Emilia Romagna is lush with gentle rolling hills where time honored ingredients like truffles, olives, and vast vineyards can be found. But this region is usually overshadowed by it’s more famous neighboring cities, Florence and Venice. To understand the food of this region, Liesel explores the quaint sea-side town of Rimini and the hugely impressive Bologna. Its a tale of discovering local foodie passion that allows Liesel to hunt for truffles and try her hand in making her own gelato, a the world’s only Gelato University!

programme.title: Xilingol
programme.desc: In Xilin Gol, the local cuisines here are so attractive to the tourists, such as the roasted lamb is a traditional local dish. And the fired stone fried lamb is so hard to find if you are not traveling to Inner Mongolia.Just join in this visual trip!

programme.title: Kunming
programme.desc: Join host Tianran He in Kunming, the capital of Yunnan province in southwest China. Named the Spring City for its perennially good weather, Kunming is one of Chinas most ethnically diverse cities, something thats reflected in its food.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 1"
programme.desc: Join Chef Sara Aqel as she explores Jordan’s northern produce, landscapes, and historical sights before hosting an idyllic dinner at Amman’s Citadel.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Expedias Super Supper Club - Jordan S1 - "Part 2"
programme.desc: Join Chef Ali Ghzawi as he takes us on a journey through Jordans southern sights of Petra, Aqaba, and Wadi Rum, using the best local produce, for a dinner at the Dead Sea.

programme.title: Mushroom
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Mushroom"
programme.desc: Lauren dives into the fascinating world of mushrooms, exploring their flavors, textures, and health benefits. She shows how to make savory mushroom sausage rolls and delicious mushroom steaks, showcasing the versatility of these earthy ingredients.

programme.title: Chocolate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Chocolate"
programme.desc: Indulge in Laurens exploration of the chocolate world as she uncovers its unique types and characteristics. From savory chocolate salsa to raw vegan cake, her mix of sweet and savory recipes leaves a lasting appreciation for this beloved ingredient.

programme.title: Philippines
programme.desc: The nation of 7,000 islands has no problems with beach, sun, or sea; but they suffer tremendously with cuisine image. Jonathan lands in Manila to discover the top chefs are well aware of the issue and, following their advice, he launches off on an expedition to find part of the solution. Driving from headhunting tribal villages, to step-back-in-time colonial towns, to restaurants in the shadow of the American military behemoth an intriguing story slowly pieces together. In the dense jungle one treasure stays buried while another comes literally out of the woodwork. But danger always lurks.. zombie moray eels, landslide prone passes, and forbidden fields behind the rice paddies.

programme.title: Finland
programme.desc: Finland is that one Nordic country that is never on the global cuisine radar. However, the reserved Finns have been quietly perfecting their craft of foraging culture and incorporating it into their unique cuisine. Jonathan Legg explores the entire expanse of the country to understand it’s cuisine, and the ethos of the country’s top chefs; from amazing locally sourced cuisine in Helsinki, to an expedition in Lapland to learn about foraging and the Finnish delicacy, reindeer!

programme.title: Ireland
programme.desc: It’s the birthplace of Halloween, but the ghosts and ghouls which have canvassed the world have not scared up much interest in Irish cuisine. Mounting a classic motorcycle Jonathan tours a land of mystic traditions, boisterous locals, and iconic scenery. The world’s most magnetic pub culture draws him in, border conflict pushes him out, and dark legends pull him around. It’s an adventure soaked in rain, lore, and the food of ancestor’s past.

programme.title: Samos
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 My Greek Odyssey S3 - "Samos"
programme.desc: In the final episode of the series we travel to a place that holds special memories for both Helen and I. The island I’m talking of, is Samos!

programme.title: Kos
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 My Greek Odyssey S4 - "Kos"
programme.desc: Peter is arriving on the island of Kos. It’s the third-largest island in the Dodecanese and the second-most populous. So apart from there being plenty of landmasses to explore there are also loads of interesting people to chat to along the way.

programme.title: Sorrento, Denarau
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 A Taste of Travel S4 - "Sorrento, Denarau"
programme.desc: Carolyne explores the gorgeous town of Sorrento, Italy. Scotty continues his trip in South Africa and samples some of the local delicacies. Lynton makes a splash in Denarau, Fiji. And Susannah wraps up her discovery tour of New York.

programme.title: Florence, Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 A Taste of Travel S4 - "Florence, Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Lynton explores the iconic Coral Coast of Fiji. Carolyne visits the wonders of Florence. Scotty continues his journey through South Africa and Susannah discovers a slightly more sinister side of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Lazio
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Finding Little Italy S1 - "Lazio"
programme.desc: In this episode we shall discover the north of the region: a place rich in equal parts wildness and luxury. We will visit the twin fairytale villages of Civita de Bagnoregio and Calcata that are scarcely populated and are on the brink of destruction.

programme.title: Emilia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Finding Little Italy S1 - "Emilia"
programme.desc: What do Parma ham, parmesan cheese, balsamic vinegar and Bolognese sauce all have in common? They are all from the agricultural area of Emilia-Romagna, a vast region that hugs both the Apennine mountains and the Po Valley.

programme.title: Australias Gold Coast Famous for Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Australias Gold Coast Famous for Fun"
programme.desc: In this episode, we travel to Australia’s favorite Playground - the Gold Coast, to prove family vacations can have it all! Fun and education; beach and the rainforest; roller coasters and wildlife. It’s a destination that’s as beautiful as it is FUN!

programme.title: Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Maximum Foodie S1 - "Philippines: Why is Filipino food unpopular?"
programme.desc: Liesel embarks on a journey to the country of over 7000 islands, the Philippines. From the serene to the seedy, she combs through metro Manila discovering the food; this culinary spectrum includes bouncing around trying the popular fast food joints, meeting the local experts such as blogger Cheryl Tiu, a taste of history at the worlds oldest Chinatown, an unexpected dancing session at the Spanish haunts of Manila, to rubbing shoulders with the elite Chefs of the city. All in a quest to answer just why Filipino cuisine is unheard of!

programme.title: MEXICO and EAST ORIENT EXPRESS
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Travel in Style S2 - "MEXICO and EAST ORIENT EXPRESS"
programme.desc: Forget Cancun for a luxury Mexico break – meet Maroma! In Asia, the train glides through a lush tropical Malaysia into the heart of buzzing Bangkok.

programme.title: FRANCE and PRAGUE
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Travel in Style S2 - "FRANCE and PRAGUE"
programme.desc: We visit the medieval walled city of Carcassonne. Part two finds us in another city steeped in history chasing gastronomic delights in Prague.

programme.title: JERSEY and ITALY
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Travel in Style S2 - "JERSEY and ITALY"
programme.desc: Nestled some 12 miles off Normandy France lays the beautiful channel Island of Jersey. Part two we fly across to Portofino in Italy.

programme.title: Malta (Pt 2)
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 The Travel Bug S6 - "Malta (Pt 2)"
programme.desc: It doesn’t take long to discover that Malta might be a small country, but boy does it have loads to offer travellers. This episode sees Morgan delving a little deeper as he comes to understand more about what makes this place tick.

programme.title: Greece (Pt 1)
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 The Travel Bug S6 - "Greece (Pt 1)"
programme.desc: Over the next two episodes Morgan heads from Athens, across to Corinth, through Tripoli and Kalamata, eventually finding his way to the coast of Stoupa. Morgan is going to show you the old world and the new.

programme.title: Greece and Crete
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 The Travel Bug S6 - "Greece and Crete"
programme.desc: In this episode the Greece adventure continues as we spend a little more time checking out the mainland, eventually finding our way to the southernmost point. From there it’s back to Athens to board a ferry across to Crete.

programme.title: Barcelona V Lake Como
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Jet Set S1 - "Barcelona V Lake Como"
programme.desc: Both Richard and Gill battle it out with their list of whose who, responsible for putting their locations, Barcelona and Lake Como on the world map.

programme.title: London V Bangkok
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Jet Set S1 - "London V Bangkok"
programme.desc: London versus Bangkok. Helicopter versus tuck tuck. With so much to see and do in each capital city whose method of transport will win Dave’s seal of approval?

programme.title: The Loire V Anuradhapura (Sri Lanka)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Jet Set S1 - "The Loire V Anuradhapura (Sri Lanka)"
programme.desc: Gill embarks on more than a wine tasting tour of France as Amboise is also the former residence of the French royal family. Meanwhile Richard embarks on his own historical tour of Sri Lanka, visiting some the islands ancient temples and ruins.

programme.title: Nysiros
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 My Greek Odyssey S4 - "Nysiros"
programme.desc: In this episode Peter is making his way across to Nisyros. After spending the first few days of this trip to Greece exploring the busy hub of Kos it was time to go somewhere a little more relaxed which Nisyros sure is.

programme.title: Tilos and Symi
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 My Greek Odyssey S4 - "Tilos and Symi"
programme.desc: In the last couple of episodes weve been to Kos and Nysiros and now Peter finds himself headed to the tiny island of Tilos.

programme.title: Symi and Alimia
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 My Greek Odyssey S4 - "Symi and Alimia"
programme.desc: Join Peter and he continues his time on Symi. Hed already spent a couple of days here but with so much to see and do he decided to stay the week.

programme.title: Athens, Tokyo
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 A Taste of Travel S4 - "Athens, Tokyo"
programme.desc: Scotty wraps up his South African adventure with a visit to the Cape. Carolyne goes on a sojourn around Greece’s capital, Athens. Susannah explores one of LA’s unusual hot spots. Scotty ticks off one of his life-long bucket lists, Tokyo Japan.

programme.title: Bangkok, Paris
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 A Taste of Travel S4 - "Bangkok, Paris"
programme.desc: Susannah explores the sights and sounds of Bangkok, Thailand. Susannah continues her European Tour, exploring the islands of Greece and the magical city of Paris. Scotty’s Japan adventure continues as he goes on a trek to marvel at Mount Fuji.

programme.title: Burgundy, Delhi
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 A Taste of Travel S4 - "Burgundy, Delhi"
programme.desc: Carolyne visits beautiful Beaune in the heart of the winemaking region, Burgundy. Lynton tackles the manic and marvellous Old Delhi in India. Scotty continues his Japanese love affair and Susannah hits the highlights of Thailand’s Phuket Island.

programme.title: Martinique
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Traveling with Denella S4 - "Martinique"
programme.desc: Denella travels to the French Caribbean Island of Martinique where she learns how to sail aboard a traditional YOLE boat.

programme.title: Nassau
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Traveling with Denella S4 - "Nassau"
programme.desc: Denella travels to Nassau.

programme.title: Antigua
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Traveling with Denella S4 - "Antigua"
programme.desc: Denella goes to Stingray City and swims for the first time with Stingrays.

programme.title: Iconic Downunder - Lady Elliot Island
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Iconic Downunder - Lady Elliot Island"
programme.desc: From cute Koalas to the world heritage Great Barrier Reef, this family ticks off seeing two of Australia’s biggest icons and learning about their vulnerability and how as tourists we can help.

programme.title: Escape To The Rockies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Escape To The Rockies"
programme.desc: We travel to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Canadian Rocky Mountains for their stunning natural beauty, historical castles, and epic adventures. This is a destination where protecting its natural resources comes before anything else.

programme.title: SCOTLAND and SWITZERLAND
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Travel in Style S2 - "SCOTLAND and SWITZERLAND"
programme.desc: It’s a royal theme in part one as we stay in the royal mile of Edinburgh in Scotland in the famous Balmoral Hotel now owned by Rocco Forte. In Switzerland we discover the lake based city of Geneva with its famous landmark the Jet d’Eau.

programme.title: FRANCE
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Travel in Style S2 - "FRANCE"
programme.desc: In Paris we visit Hotel le Meurice and Hotel Plaza Athenee, then head down south to sunny Cannes and stay in the Carlton made famous of course by Elton John.

programme.title: ITALY and FRANCE
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Travel in Style S2 - "ITALY and FRANCE"
programme.desc: This time we visit Milan the home of fashion. In part two we are all at sea, well more on river to be truthful in beautiful Burgandy in the wine region of France.

programme.title: Crete
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 The Travel Bug S6 - "Crete"
programme.desc: Morgan has found his way to the island of Crete, a place that’s the last stop before hitting North Africa and combines influences from there, Europe and the Middle East to create a unique mix of tastes, sights and sounds.

programme.title: Special
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 The Travel Bug S6 - "Special"
programme.desc: After a busy year travelling the world there were lots of highlights across the series we had to leave out. But so you dont miss any of them, we made a special episode to show these moments that were experienced during the journey.

programme.title: Bali
programme.desc: The Luxe Travels season starts off in the beautiful and highly popular tourism hotspot; Bali. The host, Liesel Hlista embarks on a mission to understand how the Balinese blend hospitality with luxury.

programme.title: Ireland
programme.desc: An uncommon destination for a series that explores exotic tropical getaways. But this island nation has some of the most evocative landscapes that mother nature has to offer!

programme.title: Berlin
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx journeys Berlin, one of the worlds undisputed techno capitals, and discovers the sound of freedom buried in its history.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.desc: DJ-producer Carly Foxx travels to the clubbing capital of the world to inspire her music track and discovers Ibiza’s alternative spiritual side.

programme.title: Impact Zone
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Impact Zone"
programme.desc: Francisco Porcella displays the unquenchable spirit that drives the desire to chase big waves.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kylman saan saapuessa aikaisin ja velkojen kasaantuessa miehisto tyontaa, vetaa ja raahaa mammuttimaisen ja mahdollisesti kauden pelastavan lohkareen leirille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivoksesta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivokselta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Elokuun hurjan lumimyrskyn takia Claudian ja Robinin on pakko jaada 2 Mileen, kun taas Gary ja Garon yrittavat pelastaa tilanteen ajamalla myrskyn lapi ja tuomalla heille tarvikkeita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin tekee vaikean paatoksen rakkaan kaivosautonsa Six packin suhteen toisen kalliiksi tulleen rikkoutumisen jalkeen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa Claudia ajaa uupuneen miehistonsa murtumispisteeseen, mika saa kiihkon leimahtamaan ja pakottaa Claudian viimein hyvaksymaan tappionsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa ylittaa tulvivia jokia matkalla kaivokselle koneet mukanaan, mutta Josh jaa jalkeen ongelmallisen kaivinkoneen takia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Juuri kun Wolverinen miehisto tehostaa turvallisuusmenetelmiaan, uusi tyontekija Jay romahtaa, mika paljastaa heidan hatavalmiutensa sarot.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh kayttaa uutta kaivinkonetta, kun taas arvottomien kivien kasa saa Claudian harkitsemaan uutta strategiaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun miehisto rampii mudassa etsiessaan miljoonan dollarin arvoista lohkaretta, Josh riskeeraa puolen miljoonan dollarin arvoisen kaluston yrittaessaan vetaa rekkaansa pois vajoamasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested on drug warrants is upset about the BBQ brisket he left on the grill. An intoxicated ladies man flirts with the jail staff and an inmate finds it funny that he sold tree leaves as pot to an undercover officer. Brother turns on brother when a good deed gets mixed with alcohol. A man caught panhandling believes officers should arrest hardened criminals instead of him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Over the course of a single shift, officers are forced to go toe to toe with a hotheaded inmate refusing to change cells without a fight and then must deal with the whims of a homeless man who demands room service and an upgraded jail cell.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why hes been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A combative man is placed in a side cell. A transgender woman shares her story. A wild driver is placed in custody, and an intoxicated man is arrested for assault.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A jail chaplain counsels a sad inmate. An intoxicated woman demands to talk to the Canadian Embassy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate interrupts the booking process. A couple is brought in after signs of a domestic dispute but claim they were being intimate, and a jailed woman shares some of her Webcam exploits.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A violent ruckus ensues after a man is placed in jail. Secret prison communication methods are explored and examined. Later, deputies cautiously extract a disruptive man while his wife is held nearby.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: The night of the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight a woman pummels a nightclub security guard for an unusual reason. A man who claims to have served in the military confronts a Lieutenant and threatens fellow detainees in the holding cell. A “Pac-man” fan has a spat with his Mayweather-backing wife.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman who was nabbed for jaywalking claims the police were out of line for arresting her. A woman is brought in on domestic-violence charges, and a drug peddler claims hes selling to support his addiction to poker.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A homeless man punches a singing transient over a racist comment. An assailant hits a sleeping man with a brick over a money dispute. A sobbing young man insists he was falsely arrested. A bar fight sends a UFC fighter to the hospital and the bartender who slugged him to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a belligerent woman is restrained. In Portland, OR a repeat offender is placed in isolation for unruly behavior. In Las Vegas, NV a man opens up about how his friends and family feel about him in a holding cell. In Spokane, WA a man is jailed in an attempt to steal coffee for his friends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After falling down a flight of stairs while drunk, a young man is amazed he is in jail for refusing to go to the hospital. A correction officer tries to explain to a young man why carrying a gun-shaped knife is not a good idea. An expectant father is arrested after a gin-fueled rampage at his parents house and misses the birth of his first child. A woman arrested for selling fake designer purses as real ones says she didn’t know it was a crime.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Acts of aggression cause a man to be placed in a restraint chair. Jail lockdown occurs after an inmate is stabbed with a pencil. After being booked for road rage a woman unleashes a venomous tirade.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Toting his guitar, an inmate serenades the officers. One man protests his arrest and states that having cocaine is not a crime. A man claims to be an Iraqi War Veteran and challenges his detainment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative inmate complicates things. A man charged with DUI complains about the prison food. A security guard arrested for robbery fears that her dream job with Homeland Security is gone.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is charged with possession of an illegal substance. Police arrest a woman for narcotics, and a couple is caught passing a fake prescription.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Boisterous inmates are placed in restraints after initiating several verbal altercations. A woman struggles with substance abuse following the death of her fianc̩, and two young escorts discuss their "observing" strategy when casino hopping.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated inmate escapes his restraints. A young woman denies she abused her mother, and a guard removes an inmate who is causing a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A couple is taken into custody for lewd and indecent exposure. An intoxicated woman believes that she is being treated unfairly, and a man with an existing wrap sheet is busted.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate becomes aggressive during a routine pat down. A confused senior citizen thinks the detention center is the site of a poetry slam, and two girlfriends come to blows while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers have difficulty booking an incomprehensible man. A commotion at a church ends in arrest. A man wearing a tuxedo is detained after mocking officers for wearing “pig suits.”

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL officers place a hostile former Marine in isolation. In Portland, OR officers take a man into custody for joyriding in a stolen car. In Las Vegas, NV a jailed man is more concerned about the condition of his car rather than the people involved in the accident that was hospitalized.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman arrested 45 times gives advice to recently released drug users. Two Australian brothers can’t understand why playing a game of “footie” in a hotel hallway would land them in jail. A drunken nightclub security guard wrecks his scooter.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man tests officers patience. A woman tries to deceive police with multiple identities. A one-legged biker shows off his balancing skills to officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Im Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A drug dealers mean-spirited girlfriend lands herself in isolation. The police deal with an inebriated man accused of throwing rocks, and guards attempt to defuse a situation involving battling cellmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Texting, drinking and driving are not a good mix for a mother with her baby in the backseat of her car. After his arrest for shoplifting, a young man begins to realize the consequences of his lifestyle choices. A woman arrested on a warrant finds herself in solitary confinement after showing off her assets to another inmate. Officers try to convince a homeless young man that patching up his relationship with his family is better than being drunk on the streets.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: By proclaiming that he is a Gulf War Veteran, a man states he should be imprisoned. A corporal investigates a “prisoner on prisoner assault.” An Officer’s last shift is filled with fireworks.

programme.title: Jail
