programme.title: TNA Unfinished Business
programme.desc: Chronicling Mick Foleys bloodiest and most extreme matches in TNA.

programme.title: Game Of Death
programme.desc: Joskus jopa CIA joutuu luovuttamaan ja soittamaan "agentti Marcukselle". Han on haikailematon palkkamurhaaja, joka on erikoistunut mahdottomiin tehtaviin. Tyhmanrohkea isku asekauppiasta vastaan paattyy huonosti, ja Marcuksen liittolaiset hylkaavat hanet, joten han joutuu taistelemaan hengestaan ja ratkaisemaan tehtavansa yksin!

programme.title: Get the Gringo
programme.desc: Driverilla (Gibson) on ollut huono paiva, ja se huononee vain entisestaan. Hanen juuri tekemansa miljoonakeikan oli tarkoitus taata miehelle leppoisa kesaloma, mutta loistoidean toteutus menee pain etelaa – kirjaimellisesti. Kaahatessaan pakoon Yhdysvaltain rajavartijoilta verinen ruumis takapenkillaan, Driver hurauttaa vahingossa autonsa rajan lapi, kierahtaa rajusti ja pysahtyy… Meksikon puolella. Paikallisviranomaiset passittavat miehen maan pahamaineisimpaan ”El Puebliton” vankilaan, jonka lait ovat yhta oudot kuin vaarallisetkin.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: American Exit
programme.desc: Charlie Bond on tienhaarassa elamassaan. Han on eronnut hiljattain vaimostaan, kun hanta pyydetaan huolehtimaan viikonloppuna pojastaan Leosta. Huono ajoitus, silla Charlie on juuri toteuttamassa taidevarkautta helpon rahan toivossa. Leo ei tieda suunnitelmasta mitaan, han odottaa vain, etta saisi olla kaivatun isan kanssa. Samalla todellisuus saa Charlien kiinni; haikailemattomat ammattitappajat jahtaavat hanta. Hanen ainoa toivonsa on paeta maasta ja parantaa suhteensa Leoon, jota han on laiminlyonyt monet vuodet.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Lahjakas asianajaja Casey McKay matkustaa ex-vaimonsa kotikaupunkiin puolustamaan taman veljea, jota syytetaan piirisyyttajan murhasta. Siella McKay saa selville salaliiton, joka johtaa hanet avoimeen konfliktiin kaupungin korruptoituneimman rakennuttajan Gatesin kanssa. Entinen merijalkavaen sotilas auttaa Caseyta, kun kay ilmi, etta han tarvitsee muutakin kuin juridista asiantuntemusta pysyakseen hengissa ja voittaakseen jutun

programme.title: Final Shot
programme.desc: Salamurhaaja Frank on jattanyt aiemman tyonsa ja yrittaa nyt elaa naennaisesti tavallista elamaa tyttoystavansa ja tyttarensa kanssa. Pahamaineinen mafiapomo tulee yhtena paivana kaymaan pyytaakseen Frankilta apua. Mafiapomon nuori tytar on surmattu. Frank ei halua vetaa perhettaan mukaan mahdollisiin ongelmiin, ja hanen on paatettava, tekeeko murhan pomonsa puolesta vai saako rauhan omalle sielulleen.

programme.title: Meidan gangstereiden kesken
programme.desc: Painija Charlie ja jaatelonmyyja Sonny ovat huolettomia ja mukavia kavereita, jotka pysyttelevat poissa vaikeuksista. Mutta kun kaupungin ja alamaailman johtaja erehtyy luulemaan heita pahamaineiseksi tappajakaksikoksi, kaikki muuttuu... Pelastaakseen omat nahkansa Charlie ja Sonny pysyvat vaiti todellisista henkilollisyyksistaan ja pelaavat mukana hamatakseen gangstereita. Kun Charlie ja Tom saavat tehtavakseen hoidella kilpaileva perhe paivilta, ei heille jaa muuta mahdollisuutta kuin ottaa ohjat omiin kasiinsa... Bud Spencerin ystavaa Sonnya nayttelee Giuliano Gemma. Han on muun muassa vaikuttanut spaghettiwesternelokuvassa ”Ringo - tappaja” ja Dario Argenton jannarissa ”Tenebre”.

programme.title: Nerve
programme.desc: Ahkera lukiolainen Vee Delmonico on kyllastynyt olemaan varjossa. Kun kaverit painostavat osallistumaan suosittuun nettipeliin, Nerveen, Vee paattaa osallistua yhteen kisaan harmitonta hupia. Hanen parikseen osuu salaperainen kaveri, jota han ei tunne entuudestaan. Jannittava peli muuttuu aina vaarallisemmaksi ja panokset vain kovenevat hurjassa finaalissa.

programme.title: Banana Joe
programme.desc: Banaani Joen elama on yhta auringonpaistetta. Lokoisaa iloista oloa, ilman stressia etelaisella paratiisisaarella, kunnes... Joen asuinkyla on jaamassa modernin business-kulttuurin jalkoihin. Pian paikkaa pyorittavat byrokraatit ja jengit, pykalineen ja paheineen. Korruptio ja saantoviidakko alkavat rehottaa paratiisissa, ja huoleton vapauden aurinko on jaamassa pahasti pyrkyreiden ja rahastajien varjoon. Joe ei lainkaan pida siita mita on tapahtumassa, eika ole valmis luopumaan idyllisesta paratiisistaan ilman taistelua. On aika takoa nyrkein joidenkin paahan jarkea, ja nayttaa mista kuuluu ja kuka kaskee!

programme.title: Turpiin vaan ja onnea
programme.desc: Tavanomaista Spencer - Hill -mattoa. Matt Kirby ja Wilbur Walsh (Hill and Spencer) ovat hieman aggressiivisia luonteita ja joutuvatkin usein vaikeuksiin, joista kuitenkin yleensa selviytyvat nyrkkiensa avulla. Eraana paivana he tormaavat toisiinsa ja paattavat suorittaa ryostokeikan. Mutta jonkun sekaannuksen takia he varvaytyvat vahingossa poliiseiksi. Turpiin vaan ja onnea! on tavanomainen Terence Hill – Bud Spencer -elokuva, eli luvassa on huumoria ja nyrkkitappeluja. Naille italialaisperaisille elokuville on myos tyypillista melko olematon juoni. Ei naita elokuvia ole tarkoitettukaan miksikaan muuksi kuin viikonlopun viihteeksi.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 3
programme.desc: Eletaan 1600-luvun alkua feodaaliajan Japanissa, ja ratsain kulkeva mies jaa vangiksi taistelussaan samurairyhmaa vastaan. Vajaat 400 vuotta myohemmin toimittaja April O’Neil hankkii kirpputorilta lahjoja kilpikonnaystavilleen. Tavarat ovat enimmakseen harmittomia, mutta Tikku-mentori saa vanhan japanilaisen valtikan. Valtikka katkee sisalleen taikavoimia, ja yhtakkia sankarimme loytavat itsensa samuraiden Japanista, jossa he paatyvat keskelle kilpailevien laaninherrojen sotaa.

programme.title: Instrument of War
programme.desc: Kun Yhdysvaltain ilmavoimien B-24 pommikoneen pilotti Clair Cline ammutaan alas ja vangitaan Saksassa, hanen osaltaan yksi sota loppuu ja toinen - toivon yllapitaminen - alkaa. Natsien piikkilanka-aitojen saartama Cline ja muut sotavangit etsivat selviamisen lisaksi keinoja peitota vankeus. Perustuu tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: Puhdistaja (Walking Tall)
programme.desc: Kun on kyse lain noudattamisesta, yksi mies voi tehda eron! Toimintatahti Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson ei ota vankeja taistellessaan oikeuden puolesta ja murskatessaan korruptiota tassa tarinassa miehesta, joka ottaa kantaa… ja ottaa kaupunkinsa takaisin!

programme.title: Suoraa toimintaa (Missing in Action)
programme.desc: Amerikkalaiset sotilaat ovat vangittuina Vietnamissa — ja yhden miehen tehtavana on tuoda heidat kotiin tassa vauhdikkaassa toiminta/seikkailuelokuvassa, jossa paaosassa on kamppailulajien legenda Chuck Norris. Rohkean pako yrityksen jalkeen sotavankileirilta eversti James Braddock (Norris) on tehtavassa paikantaa ja pelastaa kadonneita sotilaita valtiovarainministerion virkamiehen (Lenore Kasdorf) ja entisen armeijakaverin (M. Emmet Walsh) avustuksella. Tama yhden miehen armeija on valmis tunkeutumaan Vietnamiin… mutta paaseeko han sielta takaisin?

programme.title: Shockwave
programme.desc: Kun valtava vulkaaninen myrsky koettelee maailmaa, geofyysikko Kate Ferris yrittaa vakuuttaa puolustusministeriolle, etta se ei ole luonnonilmio. Se on seurausta seismisen superaseen Hell Stormin aktivoitumisesta. Kate joutuu keksimaan keinon, jolla pysayttaa sokkiaalto, ennen kuin se uhkaa koko ihmiskuntaa.

programme.title: Flight World War II
programme.desc: Nykyaikaisen 757:n matkustajat tekevat aikamatkan takaisin 1940-luvulle ja joutuvat kamppailemaan hengestaan keskella saksalaisten ja liittoutuneitten taistelua. Yrittaessaan pysya hengissa he onnistuvat vaikuttamaan historiaan ja toisen maailmansodan loppuratkaisuun.

programme.title: Joyride
programme.desc: Hurmaava Jon on epaonnistunut elamassaan ja paattaa lahtea tavoittelemaan menetettya rakkautta. Autoekspertti Luke pakenee menneisyyttaan. Yhdessa hampurilaispaikassa tyoskentelevan vegaaniaktivisti Keiran kanssa he rikkovat normeja ja paatyvat ajamaan “lainatulla” keltaisella Mini Cooperilla Uuden-Seelannin poikki, poliisi ja media perassaan.

programme.title: The Fourth Musketeer
programme.desc: Nuori dArtagnan matkustaa isansa puolesta Gasconyn maaseudulta Pariisiin, jossa han on mukana kuninkaan muskettisoturien ja kardinaali Richelieun vartijoiden valisessa ovelassa ja erittain monimutkaisessa juonessa. Veri vuodatetaan, ja niiden, jotka eivat ole varuillaan, on asetettava henkensa vaaraan.

programme.title: Superkytta
programme.desc: Dave Speed on Miamin poliisivoimien ramapaa, jolta rikollisuuden kitkeminen hoituu luonnostaan. Erasta tehtavaa hoitaessaan, Dave altistuu pahemman kerran ydinaseen sateilylle, eika mikaan ole enaa kuin ennen. Han saa yliluonnolliset supervoimat, ja pian Miamin rikoskayrat ovat rajussa laskussa. Vastavetona paattavat kaupungin paarikolliset ratkaista ongelman nimelta Dave Speed hinnalla ja keinolla milla hyvansa... Superkytan voimat joutuvat kerta toisensa jalkeen todelliselle koetukselle, mutta ei hataa, niin kauan kuin han ei nae mitaan punaista. Kyseinen vari on Davelle kuin kryptoniitti Terasmiehelle...

programme.title: Salt And Fire
programme.desc: Tutkija kidnapataan ja heitetaan tappavaan autiomaahan, jossa hanen on taisteltava luonnonvoimia vastaan selvitakseen.

programme.title: Ghost Rider - Koston Henki
programme.desc: Tulella tulta vastaan! Johnny Blaze taistelee edelleen kiroustaan vastaan paholaisen palkkionmetsastajana. Kun salainen uskonnollinen lahko palkkaa hanet tehtavaan, han ei tunne olevansa valmis kayttamaan Ghost Riderin voimiaan ja valtaansa jalleen kerran. Mutta tama saattaa olla viimeinen tilaisuus vapautua paholaisen kirouksesta lopullisesti!

programme.title: Reunalla
programme.desc: Uskallatko ottaa seuraavan askeleen? Vankikarkuri Nick Cassidy ilmestyy yhtakkia pilvenpiirtajan reunukselle New Yorkissa. Aikooko han hypata? Pian kaikkien tiedotusvalineiden ja koko kaupungin huomio kiinnittyy Nickiin. Ja kun kaikki katsovat ylospain, kukaan ei huomaa ovelaa ryostoa, joka tehdaan kadun toisella puolella. Liittyvatko tapaukset toisiinsa? Paaseeko poliisipsykologi Linda totuuden jaljille? Ja onko Nickilla oikeasti jokin aivan toinen suunnitelma?

programme.title: Spaghettiman
programme.desc: Clarkilla ei ole myotatuntoa millekaan eika kenellekaan. Han ei valita tippaakaan maailmasta, jossa me elamme, tuskin itsestaankaan. Mutta vanhan, spagettia taynna olevan kattilan ja rikkinaisen mikron kanssa sattuneen tapahtuman jalkeen jokin menee taysin pieleen. Clark muuttuu supersankariksi, joka voi taistella rikollisuutta vastaan spagetilla. Mutta siina on yksi koukku - hanelle pitaa maksaa.

programme.title: Varkaita ja veijareita
programme.desc: "Bud Spencer esittaa kovanyrkkista poliisia, ylikonstaapeli Parkeria, joka saa tehtavakseen ottaa kiinni lipevan gigolon, Tony Roman, jolle vanhemmat rouvat jalokivineen ovat helppoja saaliita. Pian kuitenkin panokset pelissa muuttuvat kovemmiksi, kun Tony todistaa Mafian tappoiskun. Mafian ollessa valmis raivaamaan todistajat hengilta tylyn armottomalla tyylillaan, on Parkerin suojeltava Tonya ja varmistettava taman paasy elossa todistamaan. Kytan ja varkaan epatavallinen taistelupari saa aikaa valtaisaa tuhoa alamaailman keskuudessa..."

programme.title: Joyride
programme.desc: Hurmaava Jon on epaonnistunut elamassaan ja paattaa lahtea tavoittelemaan menetettya rakkautta. Autoekspertti Luke pakenee menneisyyttaan. Yhdessa hampurilaispaikassa tyoskentelevan vegaaniaktivisti Keiran kanssa he rikkovat normeja ja paatyvat ajamaan “lainatulla” keltaisella Mini Cooperilla Uuden-Seelannin poikki, poliisi ja media perassaan.

programme.title: Triassic Hunt
programme.desc: Kun kaksi geneettisesti kehiteltya dinosaurusta karkaa laboratoriosta, joukko palkkasotilaita kutsutaan ottamaan ne kiinni. Mutta kun sotilaat tajuavat, etta dinosaurukset ovat yhta viisaita kuin ihmiset, alkaa uskomaton kissa- ja hiirileikki.

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: Mies heraa sairaalassa, eika hanella ole muistikuvaa siita, kuka han on tai miten han paatyi sinne. Hanta hoitava Diana (Eastwood) ei loyda mitaan henkilopapereita, joten han kutsuu miesta John Doeksi (Rhys Meyers). Poliisi syyttaa Johnia sarjamurhaajaksi, joka on tappanut useita nuoria naisia alueella. Kun Johnia aiotaan kuulustella, han onnistuu pakenemaan Dianan avulla, joka on varma hanen syyttomyydestaan. He ajavat viimeisimmalle rikospaikalle etsimaan johtolankoja ja vastauksia todistaakseen Johnin syyttomyyden. Hyva sairaanhoitaja kuulee raastavan totuuden Johnin henkilollisyydesta seka valheiden ja petosten verkosta, joka vie Johnin viela viimeiseen ratkaisevaan taisteluun.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Uraansa aloittelevalle poliisille on vain yksi asia, joka on vaarallisempi kuin tappajan fantasian paljastaminen: tappajan fantasiaksi joutuminen.

programme.title: Hamburger Hill
programme.desc: Bravo Companyn miehet kohtaavat uskomattoman taiston Hamburger Hillilla. Neljatoista sotaan vasynytta sotilasta taistelevat mudan tayttamasta maanpalasta, joka on nimetty sen mukaan, miten se jauhaa sotilaita kuin jauhelihaa. He taistelevat maansa, toveriensa ja henkiensa puolesta. Sota on yhta helvettia, mutta tama on kauhistuttavampaa. Hamburger Hill kertoo tarinan niin kuin se todella meni. Se on raaka, inhorealistinen ja armoton dramatisointi eraasta Amerikan julmimmista, verisimmista taisteluista. Tama on taytta totta. Hamburger Hill - sotaa pahimmillaan, miehet parhaimmillaan.

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: Vuosikausien ajan nimeton munkki on puolustanut ja suojellut muinaista kaaroa – Äarettoman Voiman Kaaroa – joka sisaltaa avaimen mittaamattomaan voimaan. Nyt munkin taytyy loytaa suojatti; seuraava suojelija salaisuudelle.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Turpiin vaan ja onnea
programme.desc: Tavanomaista Spencer - Hill -mattoa. Matt Kirby ja Wilbur Walsh (Hill and Spencer) ovat hieman aggressiivisia luonteita ja joutuvatkin usein vaikeuksiin, joista kuitenkin yleensa selviytyvat nyrkkiensa avulla. Eraana paivana he tormaavat toisiinsa ja paattavat suorittaa ryostokeikan. Mutta jonkun sekaannuksen takia he varvaytyvat vahingossa poliiseiksi. Turpiin vaan ja onnea! on tavanomainen Terence Hill – Bud Spencer -elokuva, eli luvassa on huumoria ja nyrkkitappeluja. Naille italialaisperaisille elokuville on myos tyypillista melko olematon juoni. Ei naita elokuvia ole tarkoitettukaan miksikaan muuksi kuin viikonlopun viihteeksi.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inezs couple is looking for and these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inezs client currently lives in a condo and have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mikes friend invites him to an Indian wedding and tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, and Jin support and donate to Mikes charity after winning a bet amongst them and the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property and a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil and has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jins client lives a very active and busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business and pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inezs client is selling their separate properties and looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inezs couple is not too picky and open to different kinds of properties. Daryl and Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client and the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mikes client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land and privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 and 16 Jins client is definitely going to need lots of space and land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, and Mike attend Jins band practice to support her and listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently and this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy and always having a project on the go. Inezs client loves to build and create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario and discuss the clients wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah and Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, and Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission and throw a yacht party for the clients decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal and discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget wont settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isnt seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steves got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This weeks episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. Its a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and cant wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworxs cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marinos busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Lauras going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlenes one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they werent thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eves challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesnt want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryls listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style theyll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. Hes a marketing director and shes a doctor so shes often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. Theyre looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! Theyre looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryls got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipins family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: When Dana and Eric arent busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jonathan and Kerry are in the market for a new home to share memories in with their family; with a budget of 12 million dollars, Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri is challenged to find the family their dream home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Broker Jasmine Xuereb must smooth the way for buyers Cindy and Andrew to decide whether they should buy a house in their homeland or in a different country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Katerina and Mauricio are looking for one property in Canada and a holiday home in Belize, specifically on a private island.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb and Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike team up once again with local agent to find a unique opportunities for residential investments.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria cant decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshalls homeland) or Cuba (Marias homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan and Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition and Jins objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jins client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, and waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: It is time to upsize! Daryls client is moving away from downtown Toronto because they desire a bigger space, more privacy, and tranquility. They have 3 children between the ages of 7 and 13 who need their own bedrooms and the lady of the house needs an office since she works from home. Daryl knows all about tranquility and goes golfing with Mike to discuss his client and Mikes listing for them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mikes couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto and Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, and want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space and want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, and breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inezs couple is looking for and these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inezs client currently lives in a condo and have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl and Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found and Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryls client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land and nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit and eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil and has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jins client lives a very active and busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business and pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inezs client is selling their separate properties and looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inezs couple is not too picky and open to different kinds of properties. Daryl and Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client and the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mikes client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land and privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen and Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver and want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl and the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryls client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, and Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business and later in the episode Mike and Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy and always having a project on the go. Inezs client loves to build and create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario and discuss the clients wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah and Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, and Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission and throw a yacht party for the clients decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal and discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget wont settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Maes long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isnt seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steves got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This weeks episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. Its a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and cant wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworxs cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canadas leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they werent thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eves challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they cant agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesnt want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style theyll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. Shes a physical therapist and shes a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. Theyre looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Adventure awaits in the heat of the desert plains.

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.desc: Between babbling brooks and lazy rivers lives natures perfect calm.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: The North Atlantic Ocean is generous with her bounty, until she takes a life in return. Mark braves the deep seas on the most dangerous day of the lobster fishing season.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: One year after witnessing a record number of deadly twisters in Tornado Alley, Mark and Jaclyn return to the Midwest in search of more extreme storms. The hunt challenges their relationship with Mother Nature, as well as with each other.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George links up with two experienced polar adventurers to explore the frigid Canadian arctic in the depths of winter. The team first uses skis to cross the fractured sea ice of Frobisher Bay, then dog teams to head north through the spectacular Auyuittuq Mountains.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: Georges exploration of the undersea world begins on a submarine in Grand Caymon.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George and three side-kicks head straight into the “Bearcage”, looking to get beat up by the biggest, baddest hailstones that Texas and Oklahoma can throw at them. They find it – and their stormchasing vehicles don’t look too pretty after coming through these massive storms.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George returns to the “Fin Del Mundo” at the southern tip of Argentina, this time to sail on a Russian icebreaker to Antarctica. After braving the stormy Drake passage, he explores volcanic Deception Island, camps out in the Antarctic snow, and paddles a kayak through icebergs calved off the melting glaciers.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: We break the bounds of earth, and look at the environment of space. We examine the difficulties and challenges of exploring this most challenging environment.↵ ↵George experiences some of the extreme training needed for space travel –aboard a Czech-built Albatross fighter jet, the Zero-G plane, and a centrifuge producing 6 G’s of force, and witnesses the launch of a flight to the International Space Station.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: The “Angry Planet” team will be tracking storms through the 2009 Hurricane season, and plan to film george as he heads into a big one.

programme.title: Surfing and Vineyards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Surfing and Vineyards
programme.desc: Yoga and Surf are two corner stones of the Californian spirit. In this episode, the best of both worlds meets as Val shares a surf session with a local champion from Malibu! What about the surfing outfit ? No need for it, there is a yoga mat. Let’s head to Ojai, in the middle of a vineyards, and joint the "Topa Wines" group for a yoga session at the sunset. Together, we will enjoy the "Pink moment": the time when Ojai’s mountains turn pink and your mind is blown away.

programme.title: Repotting an indoor plant
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Repotting an indoor plant
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to learn how to take good care of our indoor plants. The plants that grow in our houses and flats are grown in pots. And when we buy a new plant, it is very important to repot it. The plants we buy come in pots that are often too small for them to grow well. Thats why you put it in a bigger pot.

programme.title: Fruity bowl
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Minute Bowl - Season 1 - Fruity bowl
programme.desc: In this episode we will prepare a delicious fruity bowl. For this you will need cottage cheese, banana, blueberries, raspberries, kiwi, strawberry, pomegranate, buckwheat and chia seeds. This amazing bowl includes many antioxidant fruits and is rich in vitamins C. It will help you fight against many pathologies and stay young.

programme.title: Sweet basil
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Detox minute - Season 1 - Sweet basil
programme.desc: Follow the chefs detox juice recipes and youll be able to make your own juices. What could be better than combining business with pleasure? Take care of your body by making and enjoying delicious juices.

programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Agostina (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Agostina (Argentina)
programme.desc: When Agostina’s mother was diagnosed with breast cancer, she began seeking out soft natural fabrics that would not irritate her mother’s sensitive skin. She found it almost impossible to find the right materials, so she decided to make her own. Research led her to bamboo fibers and she realised she could make a positive impact on the environment, while developing sustainable and ethical fashion.

programme.title: Solenn (Nantes)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Solenn (Nantes)
programme.desc: A former school teacher reinvents herself when she discovers a passion for sharing other women’s stories. Always inspired by the journeys of strong women, Solenn began a blog to celebrate the women in her community. Solenn’s energy and passion fueled a dream of starting her own magazine. Thanks to a successful crowdfunding campaign, this dream blossomed into a professional career in journalism and she launched a print mook (magazine and book) called Etonnantes. Etonnantes features interviews of women of all backgrounds, celebrating their diversity and success in each field.

programme.title: Sophie (Nantes)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Sophie (Nantes)
programme.desc: Always an artist at heart, Sophie grew up in the countryside amongst nature and farm animals. Her love for creating art while respecting nature turned into a drive to seek out sustainable vegetable dyes.Today, her artwork and craft are intertwined as she makes beautiful prints and motifs that she colours with natural dyes, prepared from handpicked variety of flowers and plants that turn into stunning creations.

programme.title: So the great rivers may live - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - So the great rivers may live - Part 2
programme.desc: Yann Arthus-Bertrand thus continues his world tour and his inventory of the planet with the great rivers that suffer from mans excesses as a common thread. " So the great rivers may live" is the discovery of places, men and women who are fighting so that our waterways simply have their place on Earth. Thanks to his genius, man is correcting his mistakes: the Aral Sea, which once disappeared, is coming back. In New York, millions of people have drinking water thanks to the natural virtues of the forest.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Massages
programme.desc: Massage studio will show you the best massage techniques in places which will make you dream. Let us take care of you! Lay down, relax and forget all your problems.

programme.title: My Zen Relaxation
programme.desc: Turn down the lights, kick your shoes back, take a cup of tea... Youre on MyZen TV, time to relax.

programme.title: Spiritual Sports
programme.desc: Nurture the body AND the mind with Spiritual Sports

programme.title: Pilates
programme.desc: Stay in shape with our pilates courses !

programme.title: Stretching
programme.desc: Stretching

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Practice Yoga from the comfort of your home with our experienced teatchers.

programme.title: Self-massage for the leg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 6 - Self-massage for the leg
programme.desc: No time to relax and get a massage? These exercises let you relax by massaging yourself.

programme.title: Joint relaxation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 5 - Joint relaxation
programme.desc: The joints are the first parts of the body to react badly to stress, therefore it is essential to relax and relieve them as often as possible. Some ankle and knee rotations, combined with calm, controlled breathing will allow you to soothe your joints. With a few simple, well-targeted exercises, this session will bring you deep relaxation.

programme.title: Exercises to activate the muscles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 1 - Exercises to activate the muscles
programme.desc: Need to regenerate your body? Take the time to make some exercices to decompress and find a peaceful harmony.

programme.title: Self-massage for the back and shoulder
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 6 - Self-massage for the back and shoulder
programme.desc: Bad posture and sagging shoulders are behaviors which can cause our body to suffer. MyZen TV offers a series of four exercises to massage your own back and shoulders. Practicing these simple and effective exercises can easily allow you to relax.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Of Forests and Men - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - Of Forests and Men - Part 2
programme.desc: The call of the Forest is about discovering places but above all it is about meeting those who protect this priceless heritage. Forests are essential to mankind. They capture CO2, promote the formation of clouds and therefore rain, protect the soil from erosion and provide a habitat for wildlife. From Madagascar, to France, to Cameroon, or even Eritrea, Yann Arthus-Bertrand sets out to discover the most beautiful forests, those who live in them, those who protect them and those who live off them.

programme.title: The cheese menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The cheese menu
programme.desc: Today, Julie sets on the roads of France to talk about an essential product on French tables: cheese. More than a gourmet craze, more than an end-of-meal treat, cheese is associated with French gastronomy, and is also recognized as Intangible Cultural Heritage by UNESCO. With nearly 1,000 varieties (soft cheeses, cooked, blue-veined, pressed cheeses…), the French are the biggest consumers of cheese in the world!

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Martial Arts and meditation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Martial Arts and meditation
programme.desc: Today, we will meet in Santa Monica in the hub of the last healthy trends. Val will make us discover Erewhon, the biggest organic and hipster supermarket in Los Angeles. She will then meet Troy, a guru of healthy consciousness, for an outdoor class that mixes martial arts and meditation. Then, on the legendary "Muscle Beach", the beach of all athletes, we will meet David, an action movie double, for a very aerial workout.

programme.title: Hotel Paseo, Palm Springs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Hotel Paseo, Palm Springs
programme.desc: Val takes us to discover Palm Springs, the trendy and designer city in the heart of the California desert. In the heart of a private collection, we will discover all the flora of this region: an outdoor plant museum, one of the largest collections of cacti, and even tequila flowers. Then well head to the Paseo Hotel, one of the zen and design hotels of Palm Springs, where well meet the chef of the restaurant who will concoct his signature dishes. We will end our day with a relaxing massage with crystals.

programme.title: Carving a Halloween pumpkin
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Carving a Halloween pumpkin
programme.desc: We meet again in the market garden of Romainville, for a special Halloween episode. In one of our first episodes, we learned how to sow a pumpkin seed. The pumpkins, which I had installed in my vegetable garden, have grown well now that we are in autumn. And thats good because today were going to show you how to dig a pumpkin to make a beautiful Halloween lantern.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare delicious potato cutlets accompanied by a creamy vegetable puree. The cutlets are crispy on the outside with Japanese breadcrumbs and tender on the inside, while the celeriac puree adds a touch of sweetness and lightness. This dish is perfect for a comforting and tasty vegetarian meal.

programme.title: Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare a creamy, comforting cauliflower and celeriac veloute. This mild, delicate soup is spiced up with condiments like paprika, garlic and oregano, and a touch of olive oil for an even more gourmet texture. An ideal dish for a light starter or a warming dinner.

programme.title: Paul John Elliott
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Paul John Elliott
programme.desc: Without really knowing why, Paul Elliott will change his life from cartoonist to massage therapist. Aspired by success, money, success, he will create several clinics and will eventually lose the human aspects and lose himself. A new turn, a new meeting and Paul will finally resume his dreams of painting. Follow Paul in his tumults and his happiness found.

programme.title: Annabelle Higgins and Valérie Sirois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Annabelle Higgins and Valérie Sirois
programme.desc: They are beautiful sisters, they are passionate about nature and they have a very strong common point: entrepreneurship. After years of evolution in consumer sectors, discover Annabelle and Valerie who knew how to listen to their passion to create a fitness and surf club (for Annabelle) and a zero waste grocery store (for Valerie).

programme.title: Véronick Desmarais
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Véronick Desmarais
programme.desc: The everyday work is not always easy and it is sometimes difficult to get by. If there is one thing that Veronick has learned from her experience and those around her, it is because she is able to surpass that and to embark on her dreams and plans to become a massage therapist. You will believe in your abilities too.

programme.title: Violaine Courtois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Violaine Courtois
programme.desc: Everything started from the dream of her parents, she becomes a veterinarian. In her career that she launched backwards, Violaine will meet people who will take her to a different path of life. The chance will be at the rendezvous but it is especially the courage to resume studies and create his company that will build his project. Follow the encounters and travels of Violaine that brought her to fasciatherapy and nonviolent communication.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 2
programme.desc: The incredible diversity of flora and fauna, the fight against climate change, the balance between growth and sustainable development: these are all battles being fought on five continents. Yann Arthus-Bertrand takes us on this expedition. Were off to Gabon to discover the Ivindo National Park and Port-Gentil, then on to Sri Lanka in Kandi. Back to Gabon we go to Libreville, then Lambarene to talk about turtles and the health of the local people. Finally, off to Dhaka-Bangladesh.
